ã“ã‚Œã¯ç¾åœ¨ã®ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆã®å…¨ã‚½ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã§ã™ã€‚ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«æ§‹æˆã¨å†…å®¹ã¯ä»¥ä¸‹ã®é€šã‚Šã§ã™ã€‚

FILE PATH: animal_type\app.js

//import { TYPE_META, PAIR_MAP, QUESTIONS } from "./types-data.js";
const TYPE_META = window.TYPE_META;
const PAIR_MAP  = window.PAIR_MAP;
const QUESTIONS = window.QUESTIONS;
const PAIR_IMAGE = window.PAIR_IMAGE;
const TYPE_IMAGE = window.TYPE_IMAGE;
const FALLBACK_IMAGE = window.FALLBACK_IMAGE;

// é †ä½â†’ç‚¹ï¼ˆä¸Šã‹ã‚‰ 8,4,2,1ï¼‰
const RANK_POINTS = [8,4,2,1];

// åˆè¨ˆç‚¹
const totals = { A:0, B:0, C:0, D:0 };
let idx = 0;

// UIå‚ç…§
const start = document.getElementById("start");
const begin = document.getElementById("begin");
const progress = document.getElementById("progress");
const bar = document.getElementById("bar");
const count = document.getElementById("count");
const qwrap = document.getElementById("qwrap");
const result = document.getElementById("result");
const header = document.querySelector("header");
const mainCard = document.getElementById("main-card"); // ãƒ¡ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚«ãƒ¼ãƒ‰å–å¾—

// ã‚¹ãƒãƒ›ç”¨ï¼šã‚¿ãƒƒãƒ—é †åºã‚’è¨˜éŒ²ã™ã‚‹é…åˆ—
let tapOrder = [];

// å…±é€šUI
begin.onclick = () => {
    start.classList.add("hidden");
    header.classList.add("hidden");
    progress.classList.remove("hidden");
    renderQuestion();
    updateProgress();
};

document.addEventListener("click", (e) => {
    // æ—¢å­˜ã®ãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³IDã¨ä¸€è‡´ã™ã‚‹ã‹ã€ã‚ã‚‹ã„ã¯svgå†…ã®ãƒ‘ã‚¹ãŒã‚¯ãƒªãƒƒã‚¯ã•ã‚ŒãŸå ´åˆã‚‚è€ƒæ…®ï¼ˆclosestã‚’ä½¿ç”¨ï¼‰
    if(e.target.closest("#copy")) copySummary();
    if(e.target.closest("#print")) window.print();
    if(e.target.closest("#shareX")) shareX();
    if(e.target.closest("#retry")) location.reload();
});

function updateProgress() {
    const p = Math.round((idx / QUESTIONS.length) * 100);
    bar.style.width = p + "%";
    count.textContent = `${idx} / ${QUESTIONS.length}`;
}

// æŒ¯å‹•ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãƒãƒƒã‚¯ï¼ˆè»½é‡ï¼‰
function vibrate() {
    if (navigator.vibrate) navigator.vibrate(10); 
}

function renderQuestion() {
    qwrap.innerHTML = "";
    if (idx >= QUESTIONS.length) return showResult();

    // ã‚¿ãƒƒãƒ—é †åºã‚’åˆæœŸåŒ–
    tapOrder = [];

    const q = QUESTIONS[idx];
    const node = document.createElement("div");
    node.className = "w-full max-w-2xl mx-auto fade-in pb-20"; // ä¸‹éƒ¨ã«ä½™ç™½ç¢ºä¿

    // UIæ§‹ç¯‰
    node.innerHTML = `
        <div class="mb-4 text-center w-full">
            <span class="inline-block text-indigo-500 font-bold tracking-widest text-xs mb-2">QUESTION ${idx+1}</span>
            <div class="min-h-[5rem] flex items-center justify-center px-2">
                <h2 class="text-xl sm:text-2xl font-bold text-slate-800 leading-snug w-full">
                    ${q.text}
                </h2>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="bg-indigo-50/50 border border-indigo-100 rounded-lg p-3 mb-4 text-sm text-indigo-800 text-center">
            <p class="font-bold mb-1">ğŸ’¡ å›ç­”æ–¹æ³•ï¼ˆã©ã¡ã‚‰ã§ã‚‚OKï¼‰</p>
            <ul class="text-xs text-indigo-600 space-y-1">
                <li>A. å¥½ããªé †ã«<b>ã‚¿ãƒƒãƒ—</b>ï¼ˆè‡ªå‹•ã§1â†’2â†’3...ã¨ã¤ãã¾ã™ï¼‰</li>
                <li>B. ã‚«ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’æ´ã‚“ã§<b>ãƒ‰ãƒ©ãƒƒã‚°</b>ã—ã¦ä¸¦ã¹æ›¿ãˆ</li>
            </ul>
        </div>

        <ol id="rank-list" class="space-y-3 select-none relative">
            ${q.options.map((opt, i) => `
            <li class="rank-card group relative bg-white border-2 border-slate-100 p-4 rounded-xl shadow-sm cursor-pointer transition-all active:scale-[0.98] touch-manipulation"
                draggable="true" data-index="${i}" data-original-index="${i}">
                <div class="flex items-center gap-4 pointer-events-none">
                    <div class="rank-badge w-10 h-10 rounded-full bg-slate-100 text-slate-400 flex items-center justify-center font-bold text-lg transition-colors border border-slate-200">
                        <span class="text-xs"></span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="flex-1 font-semibold text-slate-700 leading-relaxed text-sm sm:text-base selection-none">${opt}</div>
                </div>
                <div class="absolute inset-0 border-2 border-indigo-500 rounded-xl opacity-0 transition-opacity peer-checked:opacity-100 pointer-events-none selection-ring"></div>
            </li>
            `).join('')}
        </ol>

        <div class="mt-6 flex gap-3 justify-center items-center sticky bottom-6 z-20">
            <button id="reset-rank" class="btn-ghost bg-white/90 backdrop-blur shadow-md text-sm py-3 px-5 rounded-xl border-slate-300 text-slate-500 hidden">
                ãƒªã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆ
            </button>
            <button id="confirm" class="btn-primary flex-1 max-w-xs py-3 px-6 rounded-xl font-bold text-lg shadow-xl shadow-indigo-200 opacity-50 cursor-not-allowed transition-all" disabled>
                æ±ºå®šã™ã‚‹
            </button>
        </div>
    `;
    qwrap.appendChild(node);

    const list = document.getElementById('rank-list');
    const items = Array.from(list.querySelectorAll('li'));
    const confirmBtn = document.getElementById('confirm');
    const resetBtn = document.getElementById('reset-rank');

    // === UIæ›´æ–°ãƒ­ã‚¸ãƒƒã‚¯ ===
    function updateVisuals() {
        if (tapOrder.length > 0) {
            items.forEach(li => {
                const originalIndex = Number(li.dataset.originalIndex);
                const rankIndex = tapOrder.indexOf(originalIndex); 
                const badge = li.querySelector('.rank-badge');
                
                if (rankIndex !== -1) {
                    li.classList.add('border-indigo-500', 'bg-indigo-50');
                    li.classList.remove('border-slate-100', 'bg-white');
                    if(rankIndex === 0) {
                        badge.className = "rank-badge w-10 h-10 rounded-full bg-indigo-500 text-white flex items-center justify-center font-bold text-xl shadow-md border-indigo-500 scale-110 transition-transform";
                    } else {
                        badge.className = "rank-badge w-10 h-10 rounded-full bg-indigo-100 text-indigo-600 flex items-center justify-center font-bold text-lg border-indigo-200";
                    }
                    badge.textContent = rankIndex + 1;
                } else {
                    li.classList.remove('border-indigo-500', 'bg-indigo-50');
                    li.classList.add('border-slate-100', 'bg-white');
                    badge.className = "rank-badge w-10 h-10 rounded-full bg-slate-100 text-slate-300 flex items-center justify-center font-bold text-sm border-slate-200";
                    badge.textContent = "";
                }
            });
            
            if (tapOrder.length === 4) {
                confirmBtn.disabled = false;
                confirmBtn.classList.remove('opacity-50', 'cursor-not-allowed');
                confirmBtn.innerHTML = "æ¬¡ã¸é€²ã‚€";
            } else {
                confirmBtn.disabled = true;
                confirmBtn.classList.add('opacity-50', 'cursor-not-allowed');
                confirmBtn.innerHTML = `ã‚ã¨ ${4 - tapOrder.length}ã¤ é¸æŠ`;
            }
            resetBtn.classList.remove('hidden');

        } else {
            const currentItems = Array.from(list.querySelectorAll('li'));
            currentItems.forEach((li, index) => {
                const badge = li.querySelector('.rank-badge');
                if (index === 0) {
                    badge.className = "rank-badge w-10 h-10 rounded-full bg-indigo-500 text-white flex items-center justify-center font-bold text-xl shadow-md scale-110";
                } else {
                    badge.className = "rank-badge w-10 h-10 rounded-full bg-slate-100 text-slate-400 flex items-center justify-center font-bold text-lg";
                }
                badge.textContent = index + 1;
                li.className = "rank-card group relative bg-white border border-slate-200 p-4 rounded-xl shadow-sm flex items-center gap-4 cursor-grab active:cursor-grabbing";
            });
            confirmBtn.disabled = false;
            confirmBtn.classList.remove('opacity-50', 'cursor-not-allowed');
            confirmBtn.textContent = "ã“ã®é †åºã§æ±ºå®š";
            resetBtn.classList.add('hidden');
        }
    }

    items.forEach(li => {
        li.addEventListener('click', () => {
            const index = Number(li.dataset.originalIndex);
            if (tapOrder.includes(index)) return;
            vibrate(); 
            tapOrder.push(index);
            updateVisuals();
        });
    });

    resetBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
        vibrate();
        tapOrder = [];
        updateVisuals();
    });

    let dragEl = null;

    list.addEventListener('dragstart', (e) => {
        if (tapOrder.length > 0 && tapOrder.length < 4) {
            e.preventDefault();
            return;
        }
        tapOrder = []; 
        dragEl = e.target.closest('li');
        if (!dragEl) return;
        dragEl.classList.add('opacity-50');
        e.dataTransfer.effectAllowed = 'move';
        vibrate();
    });
    
    list.addEventListener('dragend', () => {
        if (dragEl) dragEl.classList.remove('opacity-50');
        dragEl = null;
        tapOrder = []; 
        updateVisuals();
    });
    
    list.addEventListener('dragover', (e) => {
        e.preventDefault();
        const afterEl = getDragAfterElement(list, e.clientY);
        const dragging = document.querySelector('.opacity-50');
        if (!dragging) return;
        if (afterEl == null) list.appendChild(dragging);
        else list.insertBefore(dragging, afterEl);
    });

    function getDragAfterElement(container, y) {
        const els = [...container.querySelectorAll('li:not(.opacity-50)')];
        return els.reduce((closest, child) => {
            const box = child.getBoundingClientRect();
            const offset = y - box.top - box.height / 2;
            if (offset < 0 && offset > closest.offset) return { offset, element: child };
            else return closest;
        }, { offset: Number.NEGATIVE_INFINITY }).element;
    }

    let locked = false;
    confirmBtn.onclick = () => {
        if (locked) return;
        locked = true;
        vibrate();

        let finalOrderIndices = [];
        if (tapOrder.length === 4) {
            finalOrderIndices = tapOrder;
        } else {
            finalOrderIndices = [...document.querySelectorAll('#rank-list li')].map(li => Number(li.getAttribute('data-original-index')));
        }

        confirmBtn.innerHTML = `<svg class="animate-spin -ml-1 mr-3 h-5 w-5 text-white inline" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><circle class="opacity-25" cx="12" cy="12" r="10" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="4"></circle><path class="opacity-75" fill="currentColor" d="M4 12a8 8 0 018-8V0C5.373 0 0 5.373 0 12h4zm2 5.291A7.962 7.962 0 014 12H0c0 3.042 1.135 5.824 3 7.938l3-2.647z"></path></svg> é›†è¨ˆä¸­...`;

        setTimeout(() => {
             finalOrderIndices.forEach((optIndex, pos) => {
                const typeKey = ['A','B','C','D'][optIndex];
                totals[typeKey] += RANK_POINTS[pos];
            });
            idx++;
            updateProgress();
            renderQuestion();
        }, 300);
    };
    
    updateVisuals();
}


function buildOrderCode(entries) {
    const groups = [];
    let i = 0;
    while (i < entries.length) {
        const tieGroup = [entries[i][0]];
        let j = i + 1;
        while (j < entries.length && entries[j][1] === entries[i][1]) { tieGroup.push(entries[j][0]); j++; }
        groups.push(tieGroup);
        i = j;
    }
    return groups.map(g => g.join("=")).join(" > ");
}

function showResult() {
    qwrap.classList.add("hidden");
    progress.classList.add("hidden");
    result.classList.remove("hidden");
    if (header) header.style.display = "none"; 

    const entries = Object.entries(totals).sort((a,b)=>b[1]-a[1]); 
    const orderCode = buildOrderCode(entries);
    const topCandidates = entries.filter(e => e[1] === entries[0][1]).map(e => e[0]).sort();
    const topKey = topCandidates[0];
    const secondKey = (topCandidates.length === 1) ? entries[1][0]
                    : entries.filter(e => e[1] === entries[0][1]).map(e=>e[0]).sort()[1] || entries[1][0];
    const pairKey = (topKey || "") + (secondKey || "");
    const pair = PAIR_MAP[pairKey];

    const title = pair ? pair.title : TYPE_META[topKey].name;
    const lead  = pair ? pair.lead  : TYPE_META[topKey].desc;

    let imgSrc = "";
    if (PAIR_IMAGE && PAIR_IMAGE[pairKey]) imgSrc = PAIR_IMAGE[pairKey];
    
    const fallbackSvg = "data:image/svg+xml;charset=UTF-8,%3csvg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='800' height='450' viewBox='0 0 800 450'%3e%3crect fill='%23f1f5f9' width='800' height='450'/%3e%3ctext x='50%25' y='50%25' dominant-baseline='middle' text-anchor='middle' font-family='sans-serif' font-size='24' fill='%2394a3b8' font-weight='bold' letter-spacing='0.1em'%3eNO IMAGE%3c/text%3e%3c/svg%3e";

    document.body.style.backgroundColor = "transparent"; 
    
    // èƒŒæ™¯ãƒœãƒƒã‚¯ã‚¹ï¼ˆmain-cardï¼‰è‡ªä½“ã®è‰²ã‚’å¤‰ãˆã‚‹ãŸã‚ã®å®šç¾©
    // å…ƒã®è‰²ã‚ˆã‚Šå°‘ã—ç™½ã‚’æ··ãœã¦ã€æ–‡å­—ãŒèª­ã¿ã‚„ã™ã„èƒŒæ™¯è‰²ï¼ˆã‚°ãƒ©ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ï¼‰ã«ã—ã¾ã™
    const bgColors = {
        'A': 'linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(255, 240, 240, 0.95), rgba(255, 220, 220, 0.9))', // èµ¤ç³»
        'B': 'linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(240, 245, 255, 0.95), rgba(220, 230, 255, 0.9))', // é’ç³»
        'C': 'linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(255, 252, 235, 0.95), rgba(255, 245, 200, 0.9))', // é»„ç³»
        'D': 'linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(240, 255, 245, 0.95), rgba(220, 255, 230, 0.9))'  // ç·‘ç³»
    };

    // ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ—ã”ã¨ã®ãƒãƒ¼ã®è‰²å®šç¾©ï¼ˆTailwindã®ã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¹ï¼‰
    const barColors = {
        'A': 'from-rose-400 to-rose-600',       // èµ¤ç³»
        'B': 'from-blue-400 to-blue-600',       // é’ç³»
        'C': 'from-amber-400 to-amber-500',     // é»„ãƒ»ã‚ªãƒ¬ãƒ³ã‚¸ç³»
        'D': 'from-emerald-400 to-emerald-600'  // ç·‘ç³»
    };

    const selectedBg = bgColors[topKey] || 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9)';
    
    // ãƒ¡ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚«ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã®èƒŒæ™¯ã‚’å¤‰æ›´
    if(mainCard) {
        mainCard.style.background = selectedBg;
    }

    // HTMLæ§‹é€ ï¼ˆçµ±åˆãƒ»ã‚·ãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ«åŒ–æ¸ˆï¼‰
    result.innerHTML = `
      <div class="relative z-10 text-center animate-fade-in pt-4">
        <div class="inline-flex items-center gap-2 px-4 py-2 bg-white/40 backdrop-blur-sm rounded-full shadow-sm border border-white/50 mb-4 animate-bounce">
            <span class="w-2 h-2 rounded-full bg-indigo-500"></span>
            <span class="text-sm font-bold text-slate-700 tracking-wide">è¨ºæ–­å®Œäº†</span>
        </div>
        <h2 class="text-4xl sm:text-5xl font-black text-transparent bg-clip-text bg-gradient-to-r from-slate-800 to-indigo-900 mb-3 drop-shadow-sm">
            ${pair.title}
        </h2>
        <p class="text-lg text-slate-700 max-w-2xl mx-auto font-medium leading-relaxed">${lead}</p>
        
        <div class="flex flex-wrap gap-2 justify-center my-4">
            ${entries.map((e,i) => `
                <span class="px-3 py-1 rounded-lg text-xs font-bold border ${i<2 ? 'bg-white/60 text-slate-700 border-slate-400 shadow-sm':'bg-white/30 text-slate-500 border-slate-200'}">
                    ${i+1}ä½: ${TYPE_META[e[0]].short} (${e[1]})
                </span>
            `).join('')}
        </div>
      </div>

      <div class="grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-2 gap-8 mb-10 mt-8">
          <div class="rounded-2xl overflow-hidden shadow-xl border border-white/50 bg-white relative group min-h-[300px] flex items-center justify-center bg-slate-50">
              <img src="${imgSrc}" 
                   class="w-full h-full object-cover transform group-hover:scale-105 transition duration-700" 
                   alt="Result Image" 
                   onerror="this.onerror=null; this.src='${fallbackSvg}';">
          </div>

          <div class="flex flex-col gap-6">
              <div class="bg-white/60 backdrop-blur-sm p-6 rounded-2xl border border-white shadow-sm">
                  <h3 class="font-bold text-slate-800 mb-4 flex items-center gap-2">
                      <svg class="w-5 h-5 text-indigo-500" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke="currentColor"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M11 3.055A9.001 9.001 0 1020.945 13H11V3.055z" /><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M20.488 9H15V3.512A9.025 9.025 0 0120.488 9z" /></svg>
                      ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ—åˆ†æ
                  </h3>
                  <div class="space-y-4">
                     ${["A","B","C","D"].map(k => {
                         const max = Math.max(...Object.values(totals));
                         const p = Math.round((totals[k]/max)*100);
                         
                         // ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ—åˆ¥ã‚«ãƒ©ãƒ¼ã®å–å¾—
                         const barColorClass = barColors[k] || 'from-indigo-400 to-indigo-600';
                         
                         // 1ä½ã®é …ç›®å¼·èª¿
                         const isTop = (totals[k] === entries[0][1]);
                         const textClass = isTop ? "text-slate-800 font-black" : "text-slate-600";

                         return `
                         <div>
                            <div class="flex justify-between text-xs font-bold mb-1 ${textClass} transition-transform">
                                <span>${TYPE_META[k].name}</span>
                                <span>${totals[k]} pt</span>
                            </div>
                            <div class="h-3 bg-slate-100/50 rounded-full overflow-hidden shadow-inner">
                                <div class="h-full bg-gradient-to-r ${barColorClass} rounded-full transition-all duration-1000 ease-out" style="width:${p}%"></div>
                            </div>
                         </div>
                         `;
                     }).join('')}
                  </div>
              </div>

              <div class="bg-white/60 backdrop-blur-sm p-6 rounded-2xl border border-white shadow-sm">
                  <h3 class="font-bold text-indigo-900 mb-3">ã‚ãªãŸã£ã¦ã“ã‚“ãªäºº</h3>
                  <ul class="space-y-2">
                      ${(pair?.bullets || []).map(b => `<li class="flex items-start gap-2 text-indigo-900 text-sm"><span class="mt-1 text-indigo-500">âœ”</span>${b}</li>`).join('')}
                  </ul>
              </div>
          </div>
      </div>

      <div class="grid md:grid-cols-3 gap-6 mb-10">
          ${renderCard("ã‚ãªãŸã®æ­¦å™¨", pair?.strengths, "bg-white border-blue-100", "blue")}
          ${renderCard("ã‚„ã‚ŠãŒã¡ãªå¤±æ•—", pair?.risks, "bg-white border-amber-100", "amber")}
          ${renderCard("ã‚‚ã£ã¨æ´»èºã™ã‚‹ã«ã¯ï¼Ÿ", pair?.plays, "bg-white border-emerald-100", "emerald")}
      </div>

      <div class="bg-white/70 backdrop-blur border border-white p-6 sm:p-8 rounded-2xl shadow-sm mb-8">
          <h3 class="text-lg font-bold text-slate-800 mb-6 text-center">ğŸ¤ ãƒãƒ¼ãƒ ã§ã®ç«‹ã¡å›ã‚Š</h3>
          <div class="grid md:grid-cols-2 gap-8">
              <div>
                  <h4 class="font-bold text-slate-700 mb-3 flex items-center gap-2">
                    <span class="p-1.5 bg-indigo-100 text-indigo-600 rounded-lg"><svg class="w-4 h-4" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M17 20h5v-2a3 3 0 00-5.356-1.857M17 20H7m10 0v-2c0-.656-.126-1.283-.356-1.857M7 20H2v-2a3 3 0 015.356-1.857M7 20v-2c0-.656.126-1.283.356-1.857m0 0a5.002 5.002 0 019.288 0M15 7a3 3 0 11-6 0 3 3 0 016 0zm6 3a2 2 0 11-4 0 2 2 0 014 0zM7 10a2 2 0 11-4 0 2 2 0 014 0z"></path></svg></span>
                    ã“ã®äººã¨çµ„ã‚€ã¨æœ€å¼·
                  </h4>
                  <ul class="space-y-2 text-sm text-slate-600 list-disc list-inside marker:text-indigo-300">
                     ${(pair?.collab||[]).map(t=>`<li>${t}</li>`).join('')}
                  </ul>
              </div>
              <div>
                  <h4 class="font-bold text-slate-700 mb-3 flex items-center gap-2">
                    <span class="p-1.5 bg-pink-100 text-pink-600 rounded-lg"><svg class="w-4 h-4" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M8 12h.01M12 12h.01M16 12h.01M21 12c0 4.418-4.03 8-9 8a9.863 9.863 0 01-4.255-.949L3 20l1.395-3.72C3.512 15.042 3 13.574 3 12c0-4.418 4.03-8 9-8s9 3.582 9 8z"></path></svg></span>
                    ã‚³ãƒŸãƒ¥ãƒ‹ã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã®ã‚³ãƒ„
                  </h4>
                  <ul class="space-y-2 text-sm text-slate-600 list-disc list-inside marker:text-pink-300">
                     ${(pair?.comm||[]).map(t=>`<li>${t}</li>`).join('')}
                  </ul>
              </div>
          </div>
          
          <div class="mt-6 pt-6 border-t border-slate-200">
              <div class="flex flex-col sm:flex-row gap-4 justify-between items-center text-sm">
                  <div class="flex items-center gap-2">
                      <span class="font-bold text-slate-500">ç›¸æ€§â—</span>
                      <div class="flex gap-1">${(pair?.compatible||[]).map(c=>`<span class="px-2 py-1 bg-teal-100 text-teal-700 rounded-md font-bold text-xs">${c}</span>`).join('')}</div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="flex items-center gap-2">
                      <span class="font-bold text-slate-500">æ³¨æ„â–³</span>
                      <div class="flex gap-1">${(pair?.caution||[]).map(c=>`<span class="px-2 py-1 bg-rose-100 text-rose-700 rounded-md font-bold text-xs">${c}</span>`).join('')}</div>
                  </div>
              </div>
          </div>
      </div>

      <div class="flex flex-wrap gap-4 justify-center mt-12 pb-8">
        <button id="shareX" class="btn-primary py-3 px-6 rounded-xl font-bold flex items-center gap-2">
            <svg class="w-4 h-4" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path d="M18.244 2.25h3.308l-7.227 8.26 8.502 11.24H16.17l-5.214-6.817L4.99 21.75H1.68l7.73-8.835L1.254 2.25H8.08l4.713 6.231zm-1.161 17.52h1.833L7.084 4.126H5.117z"/></svg>
            çµæœã‚’ãƒã‚¹ãƒˆ
        </button>
        <button id="copy" class="btn-ghost py-3 px-6 rounded-xl font-bold bg-white/50 backdrop-blur">ãƒ†ã‚­ã‚¹ãƒˆã‚³ãƒ”ãƒ¼</button>
        <a href="list.html" class="btn-ghost py-3 px-6 rounded-xl font-bold bg-white/50 backdrop-blur text-indigo-600 border-indigo-200 hover:bg-indigo-50 flex items-center gap-2">
            <svg class="w-5 h-5" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M19 11H5m14 0a2 2 0 012 2v6a2 2 0 01-2 2H5a2 2 0 01-2-2v-6a2 2 0 012-2m14 0V9a2 2 0 00-2-2M5 11V9a2 2 0 012-2m0 0V5a2 2 0 012-2h6a2 2 0 012 2v2M7 7h10"></path></svg>
            å…¨ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ—å›³é‘‘
        </a>
        <button id="retry" class="btn-ghost py-3 px-6 rounded-xl font-bold bg-white/50 backdrop-blur">æœ€åˆã‹ã‚‰ã‚„ã‚Šç›´ã™</button>
      </div>
    `;

    function renderCard(title, items, colorClass, colorName) {
        return `
        <div class="backdrop-blur-sm p-5 rounded-2xl border shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition ${colorClass}">
            <h4 class="font-bold mb-3 text-${colorName}-800">${title}</h4>
            <ul class="space-y-2">
                ${(items||[]).map(t => `
                    <li class="text-sm text-slate-700 flex items-start gap-2">
                        <span class="mt-1.5 w-1.5 h-1.5 rounded-full bg-${colorName}-500 flex-shrink-0"></span>
                        <span class="leading-relaxed opacity-90">${t}</span>
                    </li>
                `).join('')}
            </ul>
        </div>`;
    }

    window.__summary = buildSummary({
        title, lead, orderCode, totals, topKey, secondKey,
        strengths: pair?.strengths || [],
        risks: pair?.risks || [],
        plays: pair?.plays || []
    });
}

function buildSummary({title, lead, orderCode, totals, topKey, secondKey, strengths, risks, plays}){
    return [
        `ã€ãƒ“ã‚¸ãƒã‚¹ã‚¢ãƒ‹ãƒãƒ«è¨ºæ–­ã€‘`,
        `ç§ã®ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ—ã¯ï¼š${TYPE_META[topKey].short}Ã—${TYPE_META[secondKey].short}ã€Œ${title}ã€ã§ã—ãŸã€‚`,
        ``,
        `ğŸ“Š ${lead}`,
        `ğŸš€ å¼·ã¿: ${strengths.slice(0,2).join(" / ")}`,
        `âš ï¸ æ³¨æ„: ${risks.slice(0,1).join("")}`,
        ``,
        `#ãƒ“ã‚¸ãƒã‚¹ã‚¢ãƒ‹ãƒãƒ«è¨ºæ–­`
    ].join("\n");
}

function copySummary(){
    if (!window.__summary) return;
    navigator.clipboard.writeText(window.__summary).then(()=> toast("çµæœã‚’ã‚³ãƒ”ãƒ¼ã—ã¾ã—ãŸï¼"));
}
function shareX(){
    if (!window.__summary) return;
    const text = encodeURIComponent(window.__summary);
    const url = "https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=" + text;
    window.open(url, "_blank");
}
function toast(msg){
    const t = document.createElement("div");
    t.innerHTML = `
        <div class="bg-slate-800 text-white px-6 py-3 rounded-full shadow-lg flex items-center gap-2">
            <svg class="w-5 h-5 text-emerald-400" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M5 13l4 4L19 7"></path></svg>
            ${msg}
        </div>`;
    t.className = "fixed bottom-8 left-1/2 -translate-x-1/2 z-50 fade-in";
    document.body.appendChild(t);
    setTimeout(()=>{ t.style.opacity='0'; setTimeout(()=>t.remove(),500); }, 2000);
}

<script src="./types-data.js"></script>
<script>
    // è‰²è¨­å®šï¼ˆapp.jsã¨å…±é€šï¼‰
    const COLORS = {
        'A': { bg: 'bg-rose-50', border: 'border-rose-200', text: 'text-rose-600', badge: 'bg-rose-100 text-rose-700' },
        'B': { bg: 'bg-blue-50', border: 'border-blue-200', text: 'text-blue-600', badge: 'bg-blue-100 text-blue-700' },
        'C': { bg: 'bg-amber-50', border: 'border-amber-200', text: 'text-amber-600', badge: 'bg-amber-100 text-amber-700' },
        'D': { bg: 'bg-emerald-50', border: 'border-emerald-200', text: 'text-emerald-600', badge: 'bg-emerald-100 text-emerald-700' }
    };

    const container = document.getElementById('grid-container');
    const modal = document.getElementById('modal');
    const modalContent = document.getElementById('modal-content');
    const modalBody = document.getElementById('modal-body');
    const closeModal = document.getElementById('close-modal');

    // 12ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ—ã‚’ç”Ÿæˆ
    Object.keys(window.PAIR_MAP).forEach(key => {
        const data = window.PAIR_MAP[key];
        const mainType = key.charAt(0); // 1æ–‡å­—ç›®(A,B,C,D)ã§è‰²ã‚’æ±ºå®š
        const subType = key.charAt(1);
        const color = COLORS[mainType];
        
        // ç”»åƒãƒ‘ã‚¹è§£æ±º
        let imgSrc = window.PAIR_IMAGE && window.PAIR_IMAGE[key] ? window.PAIR_IMAGE[key] : window.FALLBACK_IMAGE;
        const fallbackSvg = "data:image/svg+xml;charset=UTF-8,%3csvg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='800' height='450' viewBox='0 0 800 450'%3e%3crect fill='%23f1f5f9' width='800' height='450'/%3e%3ctext x='50%25' y='50%25' dominant-baseline='middle' text-anchor='middle' font-family='sans-serif' font-size='24' fill='%2394a3b8' font-weight='bold' letter-spacing='0.1em'%3eNO IMAGE%3c/text%3e%3c/svg%3e";

        // ã‚«ãƒ¼ãƒ‰HTMLç”Ÿæˆ
        const card = document.createElement('div');
        card.className = `type-card glass-card relative overflow-hidden cursor-pointer group flex flex-col h-full bg-white/40`;
        card.onclick = () => openModal(key);

        card.innerHTML = `
            <div class="absolute top-0 left-0 w-full h-1.5 ${color.badge.replace('text','bg').replace('100','500')}"></div>
            <div class="p-5 flex flex-col h-full">
                <div class="flex justify-between items-start mb-4">
                    <span class="px-2 py-1 rounded-md text-xs font-black tracking-widest uppercase border ${color.border} ${color.badge}">
                        TYPE ${key}
                    </span>
                    <span class="text-xs font-bold text-slate-400">${window.TYPE_META[mainType].short}Ã—${window.TYPE_META[subType].short}</span>
                </div>
                
                <h3 class="text-xl font-black text-slate-800 mb-2 group-hover:text-indigo-600 transition-colors">${data.title}</h3>
                <p class="text-xs text-slate-500 font-bold mb-4 line-clamp-2 min-h-[2.5em]">${data.lead}</p>
                
                <div class="mt-auto w-full aspect-video rounded-xl overflow-hidden bg-slate-100 border border-slate-200 relative">
                    <img src="${imgSrc}" class="w-full h-full object-cover transform group-hover:scale-110 transition duration-700"
                         onerror="this.onerror=null; this.src='${fallbackSvg}';">
                    <div class="absolute inset-0 bg-black/0 group-hover:bg-black/10 transition duration-300 flex items-center justify-center">
                        <span class="bg-white/90 px-4 py-2 rounded-full text-xs font-bold shadow-sm opacity-0 group-hover:opacity-100 transform translate-y-2 group-hover:translate-y-0 transition duration-300">
                            è©³ã—ãè¦‹ã‚‹
                        </span>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        `;
        container.appendChild(card);
    });

    // ãƒ¢ãƒ¼ãƒ€ãƒ«åˆ¶å¾¡
    function openModal(key) {
        const pair = window.PAIR_MAP[key];
        const mainType = key.charAt(0);
        const color = COLORS[mainType];
        let imgSrc = window.PAIR_IMAGE && window.PAIR_IMAGE[key] ? window.PAIR_IMAGE[key] : window.FALLBACK_IMAGE;
        const fallbackSvg = "data:image/svg+xml;charset=UTF-8,%3csvg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='800' height='450' viewBox='0 0 800 450'%3e%3crect fill='%23f1f5f9' width='800' height='450'/%3e%3ctext x='50%25' y='50%25' dominant-baseline='middle' text-anchor='middle' font-family='sans-serif' font-size='24' fill='%2394a3b8' font-weight='bold' letter-spacing='0.1em'%3eNO IMAGE%3c/text%3e%3c/svg%3e";

        // ãƒ¢ãƒ¼ãƒ€ãƒ«ã®ä¸­èº«ã‚’ä½œæˆï¼ˆresultç”»é¢ã®ãƒ¬ã‚¤ã‚¢ã‚¦ãƒˆã‚’å†åˆ©ç”¨ãƒ»ç°¡ç•¥åŒ–ï¼‰
        modalBody.innerHTML = `
            <div class="text-center mb-8">
                <div class="inline-block px-3 py-1 mb-3 text-xs font-bold tracking-wider rounded-full border ${color.border} ${color.badge}">TYPE ${key}</div>
                <h2 class="text-3xl sm:text-4xl font-black text-slate-800 mb-4">${pair.title}</h2>
                <p class="text-lg text-slate-600 font-medium leading-relaxed">${pair.lead}</p>
            </div>

            <div class="grid md:grid-cols-2 gap-8 mb-8">
                <div class="rounded-2xl overflow-hidden shadow-lg border border-slate-100">
                     <img src="${imgSrc}" class="w-full h-full object-cover" onerror="this.onerror=null; this.src='${fallbackSvg}';">
                </div>
                <div class="bg-indigo-50/50 p-6 rounded-2xl border border-indigo-100">
                    <h3 class="font-bold text-indigo-900 mb-4">ç‰¹å¾´</h3>
                    <ul class="space-y-3">
                        ${(pair.bullets || []).map(b => `<li class="flex items-start gap-2 text-indigo-800 text-sm"><span class="mt-1 text-indigo-500">âœ”</span>${b}</li>`).join('')}
                    </ul>
                </div>
            </div>

            <div class="grid md:grid-cols-3 gap-4 mb-8">
                 ${renderMiniCard("æ­¦å™¨", pair.strengths, "bg-blue-50 text-blue-800 border-blue-100", "blue")}
                 ${renderMiniCard("å¤±æ•—", pair.risks, "bg-amber-50 text-amber-800 border-amber-100", "amber")}
                 ${renderMiniCard("æ´»èº", pair.plays, "bg-emerald-50 text-emerald-800 border-emerald-100", "emerald")}
            </div>

            <div class="bg-slate-50 p-6 rounded-2xl border border-slate-200">
                <h3 class="font-bold text-slate-700 mb-4 text-center">ğŸ¤ ãƒãƒ¼ãƒ ã§ã®ç›¸æ€§ã¨ã‚³ãƒ„</h3>
                <div class="grid sm:grid-cols-2 gap-6">
                    <div>
                        <h4 class="text-xs font-bold text-indigo-500 uppercase tracking-widest mb-2">COLLABORATION</h4>
                        <ul class="text-sm text-slate-600 list-disc list-inside space-y-1 marker:text-indigo-300">
                             ${(pair.collab||[]).map(t=>`<li>${t}</li>`).join('')}
                        </ul>
                    </div>
                    <div>
                        <h4 class="text-xs font-bold text-pink-500 uppercase tracking-widest mb-2">COMMUNICATION</h4>
                         <ul class="text-sm text-slate-600 list-disc list-inside space-y-1 marker:text-pink-300">
                             ${(pair.comm||[]).map(t=>`<li>${t}</li>`).join('')}
                        </ul>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="mt-4 pt-4 border-t border-slate-200 flex flex-wrap gap-4 text-sm">
                     <div class="flex items-center gap-2"><span class="font-bold text-slate-500">ç›¸æ€§â—</span>
                        ${(pair.compatible||[]).map(c=>`<span class="px-2 py-1 bg-white border border-slate-200 rounded text-slate-600 text-xs font-bold">${c}</span>`).join('')}
                     </div>
                     <div class="flex items-center gap-2"><span class="font-bold text-slate-500">æ³¨æ„â–³</span>
                        ${(pair.caution||[]).map(c=>`<span class="px-2 py-1 bg-white border border-slate-200 rounded text-slate-600 text-xs font-bold">${c}</span>`).join('')}
                     </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        `;

        modal.classList.remove('hidden');
        // ã‚¢ãƒ‹ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ç”¨
        setTimeout(() => {
            modal.classList.remove('opacity-0');
            modalContent.classList.remove('scale-95');
            modalContent.classList.add('scale-100');
        }, 10);
        document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden'; // èƒŒæ™¯ã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ«å›ºå®š
    }

    function closeModalFunc() {
        modal.classList.add('opacity-0');
        modalContent.classList.remove('scale-100');
        modalContent.classList.add('scale-95');
        setTimeout(() => {
            modal.classList.add('hidden');
            document.body.style.overflow = '';
        }, 300);
    }

    closeModal.onclick = closeModalFunc;
    modal.onclick = (e) => {
        if (e.target === modal) closeModalFunc();
    }

    // ãƒ˜ãƒ«ãƒ‘ãƒ¼é–¢æ•°
    function renderMiniCard(title, items, colorClass, colorName) {
        return `
        <div class="p-4 rounded-xl border ${colorClass}">
            <h4 class="font-bold mb-2 text-xs opacity-80 uppercase">${title}</h4>
            <ul class="space-y-1">
                ${(items||[]).map(t => `<li class="text-sm flex gap-2"><span class="opacity-50">â€¢</span>${t}</li>`).join('')}
            </ul>
        </div>`;
    }

</script>
</body>
</html>


==================================================
FILE PATH: animal_type\types-data.js
==================================================

                        </div>
                    </section>
                </div>
            </div>
        </main>
    </body>
</html>
<script>
    window.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
    // åˆæœŸãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã‚„ãƒ–ãƒ©ãƒ³ãƒ‰åãƒ»ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼åã¯è‡ªç”±ã«
    MockUI.injectHeader('#app-header', {
        userName: 'Test User',
        brand: 'New SD App',
        initialRole: 'iec', // åˆå›roleãŒæœªæŒ‡å®šãªã‚‰iecã‚’ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆ
    });
    MockUI.injectSidebar('#app-sidebar');

    // ã‚µã‚¤ãƒ‰ãƒãƒ¼æŒ¿å…¥ç›´å¾Œã« data-visible-for ã‚’åæ˜ 
    RoleMock.applyRoleVisibility();

    // ãƒ¢ãƒ¼ãƒ€ãƒ«åˆæœŸåŒ–ï¼ˆ1å›ã ã‘ï¼‰
    ModalIframe.init();
  });
    // ====== ãƒ¢ãƒƒã‚¯ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ ======
    // 1ãƒ¬ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ = 1 å‹Ÿé›†ï¼ˆé¡§å®¢Ã—å‹Ÿé›†Ã—é–‹è¬›æ—¥ï¼‰ã¨ã—ã¦æƒ³å®š
    const DOWNLOAD_ITEMS = [
      {
        id: "d001",
        openingDate: "2026/06/01",
        deadlineDate: "2026/05/20",
        customerName: "æ ªå¼ä¼šç¤¾ã‚¢ãƒ«ãƒ•ã‚¡",
        recruitmentName: "2026å¹´åº¦ä¸ŠæœŸ SDå‹Ÿé›†",
        status: "DLå¯èƒ½"
      },
      {
        id: "d002",
        openingDate: "2026/07/01",
        deadlineDate: "2026/06/10",
        customerName: "æ ªå¼ä¼šç¤¾ã‚¢ãƒ«ãƒ•ã‚¡",
        recruitmentName: "2026å¹´åº¦ä¸ŠæœŸ SDå‹Ÿé›†",
        status: "DLå¯èƒ½"
      },
      {
        id: "d003",
        openingDate: "2026/07/01",
        deadlineDate: "2026/06/15",
        customerName: "æ ªå¼ä¼šç¤¾ãƒ™ãƒ¼ã‚¿",
        recruitmentName: "FY26 SDå‹Ÿé›†",
        status: "DLä¸å¯"
      },
      {
        id: "d004",
        openingDate: "2026/12/01",
        deadlineDate: "2026/11/10",
        customerName: "æ ªå¼ä¼šç¤¾ã‚·ã‚°ãƒ",
        recruitmentName: "2026å¹´åº¦ä¸‹æœŸ",
        status: "DLå¯èƒ½"
      },
      {
        id: "d005",
        openingDate: "2027/01/05",
        deadlineDate: "2026/12/20",
        customerName: "æ ªå¼ä¼šç¤¾ãƒ‡ãƒ«ã‚¿",
        recruitmentName: "FY26 å†¬å‹Ÿé›†",
        status: "DLä¸å¯"
      }
    ];

    // ====== DOM ======
    const rowsBody        = document.getElementById("download-rows");
    const searchInput     = document.getElementById("search-text");
    const statusSelect    = document.getElementById("filter-status");
    const resultCountLabel= document.getElementById("result-count-label");

    let currentSearchText = "";
    let currentStatus     = "all";

    // ====== ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ãƒ†ã‚£ãƒªãƒ†ã‚£ ======
    function parseDate(str) {
      // "YYYY/MM/DD" ã‚’ Date ã«å¤‰æ›
      const [y, m, d] = str.split("/").map(n => parseInt(n, 10));
      return new Date(y, m - 1, d);
    }

    function getFilteredItems() {
      const text = currentSearchText.trim().toLowerCase();
      return DOWNLOAD_ITEMS
        .filter(item => {
          if (currentStatus !== "all" && item.status !== currentStatus) return false;
          if (!text) return true;
          const haystack = (item.customerName + " " + item.recruitmentName).toLowerCase();
          return haystack.includes(text);
        })
        .sort((a, b) => {
          // é–‹è¬›æ—¥æ˜‡é †
          return parseDate(a.openingDate) - parseDate(b.openingDate);
        });
    }

    function renderList() {
      const items = getFilteredItems();
      rowsBody.innerHTML = "";

      resultCountLabel.textContent = `${items.length}ä»¶ã®ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿`;

      if (items.length === 0) {
        const tr = document.createElement("tr");
        tr.innerHTML = `
          <td class="p-12 text-center text-gray-400" colspan="6">
            <div class="flex flex-col items-center gap-2">
                <span class="material-symbols-outlined text-4xl text-gray-300">search_off</span>
                <span class="text-sm font-medium">æ¡ä»¶ã«ä¸€è‡´ã™ã‚‹ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“</span>
            </div>
          </td>
        `;
        rowsBody.appendChild(tr);
        return;
      }

      items.forEach(item => {
        const isAvailable = item.status === "DLå¯èƒ½";
        
        // ãƒ‡ã‚¶ã‚¤ãƒ³èª¿æ•´: Badge style match media-plan-list (squared rounded-md/sm usually)
        const badgeClass = isAvailable
          ? "bg-blue-50 text-blue-700 border border-blue-100"
          : "bg-gray-100 text-gray-500 border border-gray-200";
        const dotClass = isAvailable ? "bg-blue-500" : "bg-gray-400";

        const tr = document.createElement("tr");
        tr.className = "hover:bg-gray-50 transition-colors group";
        tr.innerHTML = `
          <td class="px-6 py-4 align-middle text-sm text-gray-600">
            <span class="font-bold text-gray-800">${item.openingDate}</span>
          </td>
          <td class="px-6 py-4 align-middle text-sm text-gray-600">
            ${item.deadlineDate}
          </td>
          <td class="px-6 py-4 align-middle text-sm font-medium text-gray-800">
            ${item.customerName}
          </td>
          <td class="px-6 py-4 align-middle text-sm text-gray-600">
            ${item.recruitmentName}
          </td>
          <td class="px-6 py-4 align-middle">
            <span class="inline-flex items-center gap-1.5 px-2.5 py-1 rounded text-xs font-medium ${badgeClass}">
              <span class="w-1.5 h-1.5 rounded-full ${dotClass}"></span>
              ${item.status}
            </span>
          </td>
          <td class="px-6 py-4 align-middle text-center">
            <button
              class="inline-flex items-center gap-1 px-4 py-2 rounded-md text-xs font-bold transition-all shadow-sm
                     ${isAvailable
                      ? "bg-blue-600 text-white hover:bg-blue-700 hover:shadow"
                      : "bg-gray-100 text-gray-400 border border-gray-200 cursor-not-allowed"}"
              data-download-id="${item.id}"
              ${isAvailable ? "" : "disabled"}
            >
              <span class="material-symbols-outlined icon-sm">
                ${isAvailable ? "download" : "block"}
              </span>
              ${isAvailable ? "ãƒ€ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ‰" : "DLä¸å¯"}
            </button>
          </td>
        `;
        rowsBody.appendChild(tr);
      });

      // ã‚¯ãƒªãƒƒã‚¯ã‚¤ãƒ™ãƒ³ãƒˆï¼ˆãƒ¢ãƒƒã‚¯ï¼‰
      rowsBody.querySelectorAll("button[data-download-id]").forEach(btn => {
        btn.addEventListener("click", () => {
          const id = btn.getAttribute("data-download-id");
          const target = DOWNLOAD_ITEMS.find(x => x.id === id);
          if (!target || target.status !== "DLå¯èƒ½") return;

          // å®Ÿè£…æ™‚ã¯ã“ã“ã§ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«DL APIå‘¼ã³å‡ºã—ãªã©
          alert(`ãƒ¢ãƒƒã‚¯ï¼š${target.customerName}ã€Œ${target.recruitmentName}ã€ï¼ˆé–‹è¬›æ—¥: ${target.openingDate}ï¼‰ã®ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚’ãƒ€ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚`);
        });
      });
    }

    // ====== åˆæœŸåŒ– ======
    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", () => {
      renderList();

      searchInput.addEventListener("input", () => {
        currentSearchText = searchInput.value;
        renderList();
      });

      statusSelect.addEventListener("change", () => {
        currentStatus = statusSelect.value;
        renderList();
      });
    });
  </script>

                        ã‚³ãƒ¼ã‚¹æ–°è¦ç™»éŒ²

                        <div class="relative">
                            <select class="appearance-none w-full rounded-md border border-gray-300 px-3 py-2.5 text-gray-700 placeholder-gray-400 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-blue-500 bg-white shadow-sm sm:text-sm transition-shadow pr-8">
                                <option value="">å›£ä½“ã‚’é¸æŠã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„</option>

                        </div>

                    <div class="flex flex-col gap-1.5">

                    </div>

                    <div class="flex flex-col gap-1.5">
                        <label class="text-sm font-bold text-gray-700">å›£ä½“ç®¡ç†ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰</label>
                        <input type="text" class="w-full rounded-md border border-gray-300 px-3 py-2.5 text-gray-700 placeholder-gray-400 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-blue-500 shadow-sm sm:text-sm transition-shadow" placeholder="ä¾‹ï¼šSN-001">
                    </div>

                    <div class="flex gap-6">
                         <div class="flex items-center">
                            <input id="check-html" type="checkbox" class="h-4 w-4 text-blue-600 focus:ring-blue-500 border-gray-300 rounded">
                            <label for="check-html" class="ml-2 block text-sm text-gray-700 font-medium">HTMLæ•™æã‚ã‚Š</label>
                        </div>
                        <div class="flex items-center">
                            <input id="check-plate" type="checkbox" class="h-4 w-4 text-blue-600 focus:ring-blue-500 border-gray-300 rounded">
                            <label for="check-plate" class="ml-2 block text-sm text-gray-700 font-medium">ç‰ˆä¸‹ã‚ã‚Š</label>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class="flex flex-col gap-1.5">
                         <label class="text-sm font-bold text-gray-700">ã‚ªãƒ—ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³æ•°</label>
                         <input type="number" class="w-full rounded-md border border-gray-300 px-3 py-2.5 text-gray-700 placeholder-gray-400 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-blue-500 shadow-sm sm:text-sm transition-shadow" value="0">
                    </div>

                </div>
                <div class="px-6 py-4 bg-gray-50 flex gap-3 justify-end border-t border-gray-100">
                    <button id="btnCloseModal" class="px-4 py-2 rounded-md bg-white border border-gray-300 text-gray-700 font-medium hover:bg-gray-50 hover:border-gray-400 transition-all shadow-sm">ã‚­ãƒ£ãƒ³ã‚»ãƒ«</button>
                    <button class="px-4 py-2 rounded-md bg-blue-600 text-white font-bold hover:bg-blue-700 shadow-sm hover:shadow transition-all">ç™»éŒ²ã™ã‚‹</button>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>

        <script type="module">
            // ã“ã“ã§åŒã˜éšå±¤ã«ã‚ã‚‹ course-master-data.js ã‚’ã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆã—ã¾ã™
            import { courseMasterData } from './js/data/course-master-data.js';

            window.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
                // --- MockUI åˆæœŸåŒ– ---
                if (typeof MockUI !== 'undefined') {
                    MockUI.injectHeader('#app-header', {
                        userName: 'Test User',
                        brand: 'New SD App',
                        initialRole: 'iec', // IECæ¨©é™ã§è¡¨ç¤º
                    });
                    MockUI.injectSidebar('#app-sidebar');
                }

                // --- çŠ¶æ…‹ç®¡ç†å¤‰æ•° ---
                let currentCourses = [...courseMasterData];
                let currentPage = 1;
                const itemsPerPage = 10;

                // --- DOMè¦ç´ ã®å–å¾— ---
                const searchInput = document.getElementById('searchInput');
                const tableBody = document.getElementById('courseTableBody');
                
                // ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ãƒãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ç”¨
                const totalCountEl = document.getElementById('totalCount');
                const startCountEl = document.getElementById('startCount');
                const endCountEl = document.getElementById('endCount');
                const btnPrev = document.getElementById('btnPrev');
                const btnNext = document.getElementById('btnNext');
                const pageIndicator = document.getElementById('pageIndicator');

                // --- ãƒãƒƒã‚¸ç”Ÿæˆé–¢æ•° (ãƒ‡ãƒ¢ç”¨ã«ãƒ©ãƒ³ãƒ€ãƒ  or ä»®ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚’è¡¨ç¤º) ---
                const getBooleanBadge = (isTrue, trueText = 'ã‚ã‚Š', falseText = 'ãªã—') => {
                    if (isTrue) {
                        return `<span class="inline-flex items-center px-2 py-0.5 rounded text-xs font-medium bg-blue-50 text-blue-700 border border-blue-100">${trueText}</span>`;
                    } else {
                        return `<span class="inline-flex items-center px-2 py-0.5 rounded text-xs font-medium bg-gray-100 text-gray-400 border border-gray-200">${falseText}</span>`;
                    }
                };
                
                // --- ãƒ­ã‚¸ãƒƒã‚¯é–¢æ•° ---

                // ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ãƒãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³UIæ›´æ–°
                const updatePaginationUI = () => {
                    const total = currentCourses.length;
                    const start = total === 0 ? 0 : (currentPage - 1) * itemsPerPage + 1;
                    const end = Math.min(currentPage * itemsPerPage, total);
                    const totalPages = Math.ceil(total / itemsPerPage);

                    totalCountEl.textContent = total;
                    startCountEl.textContent = start;
                    endCountEl.textContent = end;
                    pageIndicator.textContent = total === 0 ? 0 : currentPage;

                    btnPrev.disabled = currentPage === 1 || total === 0;
                    btnNext.disabled = currentPage === totalPages || total === 0;
                };

                // ãƒ†ãƒ¼ãƒ–ãƒ«æç”»
                const renderCourses = () => {
                    if (!tableBody) return;

                    const startIndex = (currentPage - 1) * itemsPerPage;
                    const endIndex = startIndex + itemsPerPage;
                    const slicedData = currentCourses.slice(startIndex, endIndex);

                    if (slicedData.length === 0) {
                        tableBody.innerHTML = `<tr><td colspan="8" class="px-6 py-10 text-center text-gray-500">ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãŒè¦‹ã¤ã‹ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“ã§ã—ãŸ</td></tr>`;
                        updatePaginationUI();
                        return;
                    }

                    const html = slicedData.map(course => {
                        // ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã«ãªã„é …ç›®ã¯ãƒ‡ãƒ¢ç”¨ã«ç”Ÿæˆï¼ˆæœ¬æ¥ã¯APIã‚„DBã‹ã‚‰å–å¾—ï¼‰
                        // â€»ãƒ©ãƒ³ãƒ€ãƒ æ€§ã‚’æ’é™¤ã™ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã€IDã®å¶å¥‡ã§ä»®æ±ºå®š
                        const hasHtml = (course.id % 2 === 0); 
                        const hasPlate = (course.id % 3 !== 0); 
                        const lastUpdated = "2024/01/" + (10 + (course.id % 20)); // ä»®ã®æ—¥ä»˜

                        // ã‚ªãƒ—ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³æ•°
                        const optionCount = course.options ? course.options.length : 0;

                        return `
                        <tr class="hover:bg-gray-50 transition-colors cursor-pointer js-row group relative">
                            <td class="px-6 py-4 text-sm text-gray-600">${course.org}</td>
                            <td class="px-6 py-4 text-sm text-gray-900 font-medium">
                                ${course.title}
                                <div class="text-xs text-gray-400 mt-0.5">${course.stdTag}</div>
                            </td>
                            <td class="px-6 py-4 text-sm text-gray-500 font-mono">${course.code}</td>
                            <td class="px-6 py-4 text-center">${getBooleanBadge(hasHtml)}</td>
                            <td class="px-6 py-4 text-center">${getBooleanBadge(hasPlate)}</td>
                            <td class="px-6 py-4 text-sm text-center text-gray-600">${optionCount}</td>
                            <td class="px-6 py-4 text-sm text-center text-gray-500">${lastUpdated}</td>
                            <td class="px-6 py-4 text-center relative">
                                <div class="relative inline-block text-left">
                                    <button class="flex menu-trigger p-2 rounded-full text-gray-400 hover:text-gray-600 hover:bg-gray-100 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 transition-colors">
                                        <span class="material-symbols-outlined icon-md">more_horiz</span>
                                    </button>
                                    <div class="menu hidden absolute right-0 mt-2 w-48 origin-top-right rounded-md bg-white shadow-lg ring-1 ring-black ring-opacity-5 focus:outline-none z-10 text-left">
                                        <div class="py-1">
                                            <a href="#" class="group flex items-center px-4 py-2 text-sm text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-50">
                                                <span class="material-symbols-outlined icon-sm mr-3 text-gray-400 group-hover:text-gray-500">edit</span>
                                                ç·¨é›†ã™ã‚‹
                                            </a>
                                            <a href="#" class="group flex items-center px-4 py-2 text-sm text-red-600 hover:bg-red-50">
                                                <span class="material-symbols-outlined icon-sm mr-3 text-red-400 group-hover:text-red-500">delete</span>
                                                å‰Šé™¤ã™ã‚‹
                                            </a>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                            </td>
                        </tr>
                        `;
                    }).join('');

                    tableBody.innerHTML = html;
                    updatePaginationUI();
                    
                    // å‹•çš„æç”»å¾Œã«RoleMockãªã©ã‚’å†é©ç”¨ã™ã‚‹å ´åˆ
                    if (typeof RoleMock !== 'undefined') {
                        // RoleMock.applyRoleVisibility(); 
                    }
                };

                // ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ«ã‚¿ãƒªãƒ³ã‚°å‡¦ç†
                const filterData = () => {
                    const keyword = searchInput.value.trim().toLowerCase();

                    currentCourses = courseMasterData.filter(course => {
                        if (!keyword) return true;
                        // ã‚³ãƒ¼ã‚¹å ã¾ãŸã¯ ç®¡ç†ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ ã§æ¤œç´¢
                        return course.title.toLowerCase().includes(keyword) || 
                               course.code.toLowerCase().includes(keyword);
                    });

                    currentPage = 1; // æ¤œç´¢æ™‚ã¯1ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ç›®ã«æˆ»ã™
                    renderCourses();
                };

                // --- ã‚¤ãƒ™ãƒ³ãƒˆãƒªã‚¹ãƒŠãƒ¼ ---

                // æ¤œç´¢å…¥åŠ›
                searchInput.addEventListener('input', filterData);

                // ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ãƒãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³
                btnPrev.addEventListener('click', () => {
                    if (currentPage > 1) {
                        currentPage--;
                        renderCourses();
                    }
                });

                btnNext.addEventListener('click', () => {
                    const totalPages = Math.ceil(currentCourses.length / itemsPerPage);
                    if (currentPage < totalPages) {
                        currentPage++;
                        renderCourses();
                    }
                });

                // ãƒ¢ãƒ¼ãƒ€ãƒ«åˆ¶å¾¡ï¼ˆæ—¢å­˜ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã®ç§»æ¤ï¼‰
                const modal = document.getElementById('modal');
                const btnOpenModal = document.getElementById('btnOpenModal');
                const btnCloseModal = document.getElementById('btnCloseModal');
                const btnCloseModalHeader = document.getElementById('btnCloseModalHeader');

                const openModal = () => {
                    closeAllMenus();
                    modal.classList.remove('hidden');
                };
                const closeModal = () => modal.classList.add('hidden');
                const closeAllMenus = () => {
                     document.querySelectorAll(".menu").forEach(m => m.classList.add("hidden"));
                };

                btnOpenModal.addEventListener('click', openModal);
                btnCloseModal.addEventListener('click', closeModal);
                btnCloseModalHeader.addEventListener('click', closeModal);
                modal.addEventListener('click', (e) => { if (e.target === modal) closeModal(); });

                // ãƒ†ãƒ¼ãƒ–ãƒ«å†…ã®ãƒ¡ãƒ‹ãƒ¥ãƒ¼æ“ä½œï¼ˆå‹•çš„è¦ç´ ã¸ã®å§”è­²ï¼‰
                tableBody.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
                    const trigger = e.target.closest('.menu-trigger');
                    if (trigger) {
                        e.stopPropagation();
                        // ä»–ã‚’é–‰ã˜ã‚‹
                        closeAllMenus();
                        // è‡ªåˆ†ã®ãƒ¡ãƒ‹ãƒ¥ãƒ¼ã‚’é–‹ã
                        const menu = trigger.nextElementSibling;
                        menu.classList.remove('hidden');
                    }
                });

                // ç”»é¢ã‚¯ãƒªãƒƒã‚¯ã§ãƒ¡ãƒ‹ãƒ¥ãƒ¼ã‚’é–‰ã˜ã‚‹
                document.addEventListener('click', () => closeAllMenus());

                // åˆæœŸæç”»
                renderCourses();
            });
        </script>
    </body>
</html>


==================================================
FILE PATH: css\base-style.css

:root {
  /* ã“ã“ã§ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ³ãƒˆã‚’ä¸€å…ƒç®¡ç† */
  --font-main: "Noto Sans JP", "Hiragino Kaku Gothic ProN", sans-serif;
  --font-code: "HackGen", "Consolas", monospace; /* ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚°ãƒ©ãƒ ç”¨ãªã©ã« */
  
  /* ã¤ã„ã§ã«ãƒ¡ã‚¤ãƒ³ã®è‰²ãªã©ã‚‚å¤‰æ•°ã«ã—ã¦ãŠãã¨ä¾¿åˆ©ã§ã™ */
  --color-text-main: #333333;
  --color-bg-base: #f4f4f4;
}

/* å…¨ä½“ã«é©ç”¨ */
body {
  font-family: var(--font-main); /* å¤‰æ•°ã‚’å‘¼ã³å‡ºã™ */
  color: var(--color-text-main);
  background-color: var(--color-bg-base);
  line-height: 1.6;
}

/* ã‚¢ã‚¤ã‚³ãƒ³è¨­å®š */
.material-symbols-outlined {font-variation-settings: 'FILL' 0, 'wght' 400, 'GRAD' 0, 'opsz' 24;}
.icon-sm { font-size: 1.125rem !important; } /* 18px */
.icon-md { font-size: 1.25rem !important; }  /* 20px */

/* å…¥åŠ›ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ é¡ã‚‚æ˜ç¤ºçš„ã«ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ³ãƒˆã‚’æŒ‡å®šï¼ˆè¦ªã®ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ³ãƒˆã‚’ç¶™æ‰¿ã—ãªã„ã“ã¨ãŒã‚ã‚‹ãŸã‚ï¼‰ */
input, select, textarea, button {
  font-family: inherit; /* bodyã®ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ³ãƒˆã‚’å¼•ãç¶™ã */
}

/* UXæ”¹å–„: ã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãƒãƒ¼ */
.custom-scrollbar::-webkit-scrollbar {
    width: 6px;
    height: 6px;
}
.custom-scrollbar::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
    background: transparent;
}
.custom-scrollbar::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
    background-color: #cbd5e1; /* slate-300 */
    border-radius: 20px;
}
.custom-scrollbar::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover {
    background-color: #94a3b8; /* slate-400 */
}

                                </div>

                                    </div>
                                    <div class="flex flex-col">

                                        <p class="text-xs text-gray-500 mt-1">å…¨è§’ã‚«ã‚¿ã‚«ãƒŠ</p>

                                    </div>
                                    <div class="flex flex-col">

                                    <p class="text-sm text-red-600 mt-1 hidden" data-error-for="gender">æ€§åˆ¥ã‚’é¸æŠã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚</p>
                                </div>
                                <div class="flex flex-col space-y-2">
                                    <label for="org_display" class="font-bold text-sm text-gray-700">æ‰€å±çµ„ç¹” <span class="text-red-500">*</span></label>
                                    
                                    <div class="relative mt-1 cursor-pointer group">
                                        <input id="org_display" type="text" class="w-full border border-gray-300 rounded-xl p-3 pr-10 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-sky-500 focus:border-sky-500 cursor-pointer caret-transparent bg-white shadow-sm" placeholder="çµ„ç¹”ã‚’é¸æŠã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„" readonly required />
                                        <input id="org_value" name="org_value" type="hidden" /> <span class="absolute right-3 top-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 text-gray-400 group-hover:text-sky-600 pointer-events-none transition-colors">
                                            <span class="material-symbols-outlined">apartment</span>
                                        </span>
                                    </div>
                                    <p class="text-sm text-red-600 mt-1 hidden" data-error-for="org_display">æ‰€å±çµ„ç¹”ã‚’é¸æŠã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚</p>
                                </div>
                                
                                <div class="flex flex-col space-y-2">
                                    <label for="employee_number" class="font-bold text-sm text-gray-700">ç¤¾å“¡ç•ªå· <span class="text-red-500">*</span></label>
                                    <input id="employee_number" type="text" class="w-1/2 border border-gray-300 rounded-xl p-3 pr-10 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-sky-500 focus:border-sky-500 bg-white" placeholder="ç¤¾å“¡ç•ªå·ã‚’å…¥åŠ›ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„" required />
                                    <p class="text-sm text-red-600 mt-1 hidden" data-error-for="employee_number">ç¤¾å“¡ç•ªå·ã‚’å…¥åŠ›ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚</p>
                                </div>
                                <div class="flex flex-col space-y-2 bg-gray-50/50 p-4 rounded-xl border border-gray-100">
                                    <div class="flex flex-col">
                                        <label for="email" class="font-bold text-sm text-gray-700">
                                            ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã‚¢ãƒ‰ãƒ¬ã‚¹ <span class="text-red-500">*</span>
                                        </label>
                                        <div class="flex flex-col sm:flex-row sm:items-center gap-2 mt-2">
                                            <input id="email" name="email" type="email" class="border border-gray-300 rounded-xl p-3 flex-1 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-sky-500 focus:border-sky-500 bg-white" autocomplete="email" required />
                                            <button type="button" id="send-otp" class="px-4 py-3 text-sm rounded-xl border border-sky-600 text-sky-700 bg-sky-50 hover:bg-sky-100 font-bold whitespace-nowrap transition shadow-sm">
                                                èªè¨¼ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’é€ä¿¡
                                            </button>
                                        </div>

                            <span class="material-symbols-outlined text-lg">add_shopping_cart</span>
                            <span>ã‚«ãƒ¼ãƒˆã«è¿½åŠ </span>
                        </button>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>

        <!-- Modal -->
        <div id="modal" class="fixed inset-0 bg-black/50 flex items-center justify-center hidden z-50">
            <div class="bg-white rounded-2xl m-3 shadow-2xl md:w-[420px] w-full max-w-xl overflow-hidden">
                <div class="p-4 sm:p-5 border-b border-slate-100 flex items-start gap-3">
                    <div class="p-2 rounded-xl bg-sky-100 text-sky-700">
                        <span class="material-symbols-outlined">tune</span>
                    </div>
                    <div>
                        <h2 class="text-lg sm:text-xl font-bold text-gray-800">ã‚ªãƒ—ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³é¸æŠ</h2>
                        <p class="text-sm text-gray-600 mt-1 leading-relaxed">é¸æŠè‚¢ãŒã‚ã‚‹å ´åˆã¯ã“ã¡ã‚‰ã§é¸æŠã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚ãªã„å ´åˆã¯ãã®ã¾ã¾ã‚«ãƒ¼ãƒˆã¸é€²ã‚ã¾ã™ã€‚</p>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="p-4 sm:p-5">
                    <div class="flex flex-col text-base font-semibold text-gray-800">
                        <div>Excel ãƒã‚¯ãƒ­ãƒ»VBAå…¥é–€</div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="flex flex-col mt-3 gap-3" id="optionList">
                        <button type="button" data-option="max"
                            class="option-card block w-full text-left bg-white border border-gray-200 rounded-xl p-4 shadow-sm hover:shadow-lg hover:-translate-y-[1px] transition focus:outline-none">
                            <div class="flex items-start justify-between gap-3">
                                <div>
                                    <div class="flex items-center gap-2">
                                        <div class="text-base font-semibold text-gray-900">èª²é¡ŒMAXã‚³ãƒ¼ã‚¹</div>
                                        <span class="inline-flex items-center text-[11px] font-bold px-2 py-0.5 rounded-full bg-amber-100 text-amber-700">äººæ°—</span>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="mt-1 text-sm text-gray-600">å—è¬›æ–™ã€€Â¥22,910</div>
                                    <div class="mt-1 text-sm text-gray-600">å—è¬›æœŸé–“ã€€6ã‹æœˆ</div>
                                </div>
                                <span data-check class="material-symbols-outlined text-sky-500 text-xl opacity-0 transition-opacity">check_circle</span>
                            </div>
                        </button>
                        <button type="button" data-option="regular"
                            class="option-card block w-full text-left bg-white border border-gray-200 rounded-xl p-4 shadow-sm hover:shadow-lg hover:-translate-y-[1px] transition focus:outline-none">
                            <div class="flex items-start justify-between gap-3">
                                <div>
                                    <div class="text-base font-semibold text-gray-900">é€šå¸¸ã‚³ãƒ¼ã‚¹</div>
                                    <div class="mt-1 text-sm text-gray-600">å—è¬›æ–™ã€€Â¥19,910</div>
                                    <div class="mt-1 text-sm text-gray-600">å—è¬›æœŸé–“ã€€6ã‹æœˆ</div>
                                </div>
                                <span data-check class="material-symbols-outlined text-sky-500 text-xl opacity-0 transition-opacity">check_circle</span>
                            </div>
                        </button>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="p-4 sm:p-5 flex flex-col sm:flex-row sm:items-center justify-end gap-3 border-t border-slate-100 bg-slate-50">
                    <div class="flex gap-3 sm:ml-auto">
                        <button id="btnCloseModal" class="px-4 py-2 rounded-xl border border-slate-200 text-slate-700 hover:bg-slate-100">ã‚­ãƒ£ãƒ³ã‚»ãƒ«</button>
                        <button id="btnCloseModalSecondary" class="px-4 py-2 rounded-xl bg-sky-600 text-white font-semibold hover:bg-sky-700 shadow-sm active:scale-95">ã‚«ãƒ¼ãƒˆã«å…¥ã‚Œã‚‹</button>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        
        <script>
            const modal = document.getElementById('modal');
            const btnOpenModal = document.getElementById('btnOpenModal');
            const btnCloseModal = document.getElementById('btnCloseModal');
            const btnCloseModalSecondary = document.getElementById('btnCloseModalSecondary');
            const optionCards = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('.option-card'));
            const selectedLabel = document.getElementById('selectedLabel')?.querySelector('span:last-child');

            let selected = 'regular';

            function applySelection() {
                optionCards.forEach((card) => {
                    const isActive = card.dataset.option === selected;
                    card.classList.toggle('border-sky-500', isActive);
                    card.classList.toggle('ring-2', isActive);
                    card.classList.toggle('ring-sky-200', isActive);
                    card.classList.toggle('bg-sky-50', isActive);
                    const check = card.querySelector('[data-check]');
                    if (check) check.classList.toggle('opacity-100', isActive);
                    card.setAttribute('aria-pressed', isActive ? 'true' : 'false');
                });
                if (selectedLabel) {
                    const text = selected === 'max' ? 'èª²é¡ŒMAXã‚³ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã‚’é¸æŠä¸­' : 'é€šå¸¸ã‚³ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã‚’é¸æŠä¸­';
                    selectedLabel.textContent = text;
                }
            }

            optionCards.forEach((card) => {
                card.addEventListener('click', () => {
                    selected = card.dataset.option || selected;
                    applySelection();
                });
            });

            btnOpenModal?.addEventListener('click', () => modal?.classList.remove('hidden'));
            const closeModal = () => modal?.classList.add('hidden');
            btnCloseModal?.addEventListener('click', closeModal);
            btnCloseModalSecondary?.addEventListener('click', closeModal);

            applySelection();
        </script>
    </body>
</html>

==================================================
FILE PATH: forUser\how-to-order.html
==================================================
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="ja">
    <head>
        <meta charset="UTF-8" />
        <title>å—è¬›ã®é€²ã‚æ–¹ | Course Catalog</title>
        <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
        <script src="https://cdn.tailwindcss.com"></script>
        <script src="js/header.js"></script>
        <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Material+Symbols+Outlined" rel="stylesheet" />
        <style>
            body {
                font-family: "Inter", "Noto Sans JP", system-ui, -apple-system, Segoe UI, sans-serif;
                -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
                -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
            }
            .bg-grid {
                background-image: radial-gradient(#e5e7eb 1px, transparent 1px);
                background-size: 20px 20px;
                mask-image: radial-gradient(ellipse 60% 60% at 50% 50%, #000 70%, transparent 100%);
            }
            @media (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce) {
                * { animation-duration: 0.001ms !important; animation-iteration-count: 1 !important; transition-duration: 0.001ms !important; }
            }
        </style>
    </head>
    <body class="bg-gray-50 text-slate-800 selection:bg-sky-200 selection:text-sky-900">
        <div class="fixed inset-0 -z-10 bg-grid"></div>
        <!-- Header -->
        <div id="global-header" class="sticky top-0 z-40 w-full"></div>

==================================================
