        <div id="form-actions" class="hidden w-full flex justify-between">
            <button type="button" id="cancel-edit-btn" class="px-4 py-2 text-sm font-medium text-gray-600 hover:text-gray-800 hover:bg-gray-100 rounded-md transition-colors flex items-center gap-1">
                <span class="material-symbols-outlined text-[18px]">arrow_back</span>
                ä¸€è¦§ã«æˆ»ã‚‹
            </button>
            <button type="button" id="save-btn" class="px-6 py-2 text-sm font-bold text-white bg-blue-600 border border-transparent rounded-md hover:bg-blue-700 shadow-sm transition-colors flex items-center gap-2">
                <span class="material-symbols-outlined text-[18px]">save</span>
                ä¿å­˜ã™ã‚‹
            </button>
        </div>
    </div>

    <script>
        // --- Mock Data ---
        let announcements = [
            { 
                id: 1, 
                date: '2026-01-10', 
                important: true, 
                title: 'å‹Ÿé›†æœŸé–“ã‚’å»¶é•·ã—ã¾ã—ãŸ', 
                body: 'ã”å¥½è©•ã«ã¤ãã€å‹Ÿé›†æœŸé–“ã‚’2026å¹´2æœˆ28æ—¥ã¾ã§å»¶é•·ã„ãŸã—ã¾ã™ã€‚\nçš†æ§˜ã®ã”å¿œå‹Ÿã‚’ãŠå¾…ã¡ã—ã¦ãŠã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚' 
            },
            { 
                id: 2, 
                date: '2025-12-25', 
                important: false, 
                title: 'å¹´æœ«å¹´å§‹ã®å–¶æ¥­ã«ã¤ã„ã¦', 
                body: '12æœˆ29æ—¥ã‹ã‚‰1æœˆ4æ—¥ã¾ã§äº‹å‹™å±€ã¯ä¼‘æ¥­ã¨ãªã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚ãŠå•ã„åˆã‚ã›ã¸ã®å›ç­”ã¯1æœˆ5æ—¥ä»¥é™é †æ¬¡å¯¾å¿œã•ã›ã¦ã„ãŸã ãã¾ã™ã€‚' 
            },
            {
                id: 3, 
                date: '2025-12-01', 
                important: false, 
                title: 'å‹Ÿé›†ã‚µã‚¤ãƒˆã‚’å…¬é–‹ã—ã¾ã—ãŸ', 
                body: '2026å¹´åº¦ã®å‹Ÿé›†ã‚’é–‹å§‹ã„ãŸã—ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚' 
            }
        ];

        // --- DOM Elements ---
        const listView = document.getElementById('list-view');
        const formView = document.getElementById('form-view');
        const listActions = document.getElementById('list-actions');
        const formActions = document.getElementById('form-actions');
        const headerTitle = document.getElementById('header-title');
        const announcementList = document.getElementById('announcement-list');
        const emptyState = document.getElementById('empty-state');

        // Form Inputs
        const editIdInput = document.getElementById('edit-id');
        const editDateInput = document.getElementById('edit-date');
        const editImportantInput = document.getElementById('edit-important');
        const editTitleInput = document.getElementById('edit-title');
        const editBodyInput = document.getElementById('edit-body');

        // --- State Management ---
        function switchView(mode) {
            if (mode === 'form') {
                // Form View
                listView.classList.add('hidden-view');
                formView.classList.remove('hidden-view');
                listActions.classList.add('hidden');
                formActions.classList.remove('hidden');
                formActions.classList.add('flex');
            } else {
                // List View
                formView.classList.add('hidden-view');
                listView.classList.remove('hidden-view');
                
                // ãƒ•ãƒƒã‚¿ãƒ¼ãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³ã®è¡¨ç¤ºåˆ‡ã‚Šæ›¿ãˆï¼ˆä¿®æ­£æ¸ˆã¿ï¼‰
                formActions.classList.add('hidden');
                formActions.classList.remove('flex'); 
                
                listActions.classList.remove('hidden');
                
                headerTitle.textContent = 'ãŠçŸ¥ã‚‰ã›ç®¡ç†';
                renderList();
            }
        }

        // --- Rendering ---
        function renderList() {
            announcementList.innerHTML = '';
            
            if (announcements.length === 0) {
                emptyState.classList.remove('hidden');
                return;
            } else {
                emptyState.classList.add('hidden');
            }

            // æ—¥ä»˜é †ã‚½ãƒ¼ãƒˆ (æ–°ã—ã„é †)
            const sortedData = [...announcements].sort((a, b) => new Date(b.date) - new Date(a.date));

            sortedData.forEach(item => {
                const importantBadge = item.important 
                    ? `<span class="inline-flex items-center px-2 py-0.5 rounded text-[10px] font-bold bg-red-100 text-red-600 border border-red-200">é‡è¦</span>` 
                    : '';
                
                const div = document.createElement('div');
                div.className = 'bg-white border border-gray-200 rounded-lg p-4 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow flex gap-4 group';
                div.innerHTML = `
                    <div class="flex-1 min-w-0">
                        <div class="flex items-center gap-2 mb-1">
                            <span class="text-xs font-mono text-gray-500 bg-gray-100 px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded">${item.date}</span>
                            ${importantBadge}
                        </div>
                        <h3 class="font-bold text-gray-800 text-base mb-1 truncate">${item.title}</h3>
                        <p class="text-xs text-gray-500 line-clamp-1">${item.body}</p>
                    </div>
                    <div class="flex flex-col gap-2 justify-center border-l border-gray-100 pl-4">
                        <button onclick="editItem(${item.id})" class="text-blue-600 hover:text-blue-800 p-1.5 rounded hover:bg-blue-50 transition-colors" title="ç·¨é›†">
                            <span class="material-symbols-outlined icon-md">edit</span>
                        </button>
                        <button onclick="deleteItem(${item.id})" class="text-gray-400 hover:text-red-600 p-1.5 rounded hover:bg-red-50 transition-colors" title="å‰Šé™¤">
                            <span class="material-symbols-outlined icon-md">delete</span>
                        </button>
                    </div>
                `;
                announcementList.appendChild(div);
            });
        }

        // --- Actions ---
        window.editItem = (id) => {
            const item = announcements.find(a => a.id === id);
            if (!item) return;

            editIdInput.value = item.id;
            editDateInput.value = item.date;
            editImportantInput.checked = item.important;
            editTitleInput.value = item.title;
            editBodyInput.value = item.body;

            headerTitle.textContent = 'ãŠçŸ¥ã‚‰ã›ã®ç·¨é›†';
            switchView('form');
        };

        window.deleteItem = (id) => {
            if (confirm('ã“ã®ãŠçŸ¥ã‚‰ã›ã‚’å‰Šé™¤ã—ã¦ã‚‚ã‚ˆã‚ã—ã„ã§ã™ã‹ï¼Ÿ')) {
                announcements = announcements.filter(a => a.id !== id);
                renderList();
            }
        };

        document.getElementById('add-new-btn').addEventListener('click', () => {
            // Reset form
            editIdInput.value = '';
            // Default to today
            const today = new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0];
            editDateInput.value = today;
            editImportantInput.checked = false;
            editTitleInput.value = '';
            editBodyInput.value = '';

            headerTitle.textContent = 'æ–°è¦ãŠçŸ¥ã‚‰ã›ç™»éŒ²';
            switchView('form');
        });

        document.getElementById('cancel-edit-btn').addEventListener('click', () => {
            switchView('list');
        });

        document.getElementById('save-btn').addEventListener('click', () => {
            const title = editTitleInput.value.trim();
            const date = editDateInput.value;
            
            if (!title || !date) {
                alert('å…¬é–‹æ—¥ã¨ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒˆãƒ«ã¯å¿…é ˆé …ç›®ã§ã™ã€‚');
                return;
            }

            const id = editIdInput.value ? parseInt(editIdInput.value) : Date.now();
            const newItem = {
                id: id,
                date: date,
                important: editImportantInput.checked,
                title: title,
                body: editBodyInput.value
            };

            // Update or Add
            const existingIndex = announcements.findIndex(a => a.id === id);
            if (existingIndex >= 0) {
                announcements[existingIndex] = newItem;
            } else {
                announcements.push(newItem);
            }

            // Save visual feedback
            const btn = document.getElementById('save-btn');
            const originalContent = btn.innerHTML;
            btn.disabled = true;
            btn.innerHTML = '<span class="material-symbols-outlined animate-spin text-[18px]">refresh</span> ä¿å­˜ä¸­...';
            
            setTimeout(() => {
                btn.disabled = false;
                btn.innerHTML = originalContent;
                switchView('list');
            }, 500);
        });

        // Close Modal Helper
        function closeModal() {
            window.parent.postMessage({ type: 'closeModal' }, '*');
        }

        // Bottom close button
        const bottomCloseBtn = document.getElementById('close-btn-bottom');
        if (bottomCloseBtn) {
            bottomCloseBtn.addEventListener('click', closeModal);
        }

        // Initial Render
        renderList();

    </script>
</body>
</html>

	<script src="../js/components/toggle-switch.js"></script>

	<script>
		// æ–‡å­—æ•°ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆ
		const ta = document.getElementById('free-comment');
		const cc = document.getElementById('char-count');
		if (ta && cc) {
		const update = () => { cc.textContent = Math.min(ta.value.length, 500); };
		ta.addEventListener('input', update); update();
		}

		// ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ‰é …ç›®ã®è¡¨ç¤ºåˆ‡ã‚Šæ›¿ãˆåˆ¶å¾¡
		const uploadToggle = document.getElementById('upload-toggle');
		const uploadDetails = document.getElementById('upload-details');
		
		if (uploadToggle && uploadDetails) {
			// åˆæœŸçŠ¶æ…‹ãƒã‚§ãƒƒã‚¯
			const updateVisibility = () => {
				const isChecked = uploadToggle.getAttribute('checked') === 'true';
				if (isChecked) {
					uploadDetails.style.display = 'block';
					// ã‚¢ãƒ‹ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ç”¨ã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¹æ“ä½œãªã©ã¯ã“ã“ã§è¡Œã†
				} else {
					uploadDetails.style.display = 'none';
				}
			};

			// Custom Elementã®ã‚¯ãƒªãƒƒã‚¯ã‚¤ãƒ™ãƒ³ãƒˆç­‰ã‚’ç›£è¦–
			uploadToggle.addEventListener('click', () => {
				// DOMæ›´æ–°ã‚’å¾…ã£ã¦ã‹ã‚‰åˆ¤å®š
				setTimeout(updateVisibility, 10); 
			});
			
			// åˆæœŸå®Ÿè¡Œ
			updateVisibility();
		}
	</script>
	</body>
</html>

		<meta charset="UTF-8" />
		<title>ã‚³ãƒ¼ã‚¹ææ¡ˆä¾é ¼</title>

		<script src="https://cdn.tailwindcss.com"></script>
		<link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Material+Symbols+Outlined:opsz,wght,FILL,GRAD@20..48,100..700,0..1,-50..200" rel="stylesheet" />

							<div class="shrink-0">
								<span class="inline-grid place-items-center size-10 rounded-full bg-blue-50 text-blue-600 font-bold text-sm border border-blue-100 shadow-sm">ã‚µ</span>
							</div>
							<div class="min-w-0 flex-1 flex flex-col gap-1.5">
								<p class="text-sm font-bold text-gray-800 truncate group-hover:text-blue-700 transition-colors">æ ªå¼ä¼šç¤¾ã‚µãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ«</p>

		<script src="../js/components/toggle-switch.js"></script>

		<script>
			const ta = document.getElementById('free-comment');
			const cc = document.getElementById('char-count');
			if (ta && cc) {
			const update = () => { cc.textContent = Math.min(ta.value.length, 500); };
			ta.addEventListener('input', update); update();
			}
			
			document.querySelectorAll('div:has(> input[type="number"])').forEach(box => {
			const input = box.querySelector('input[type="number"]');
			const [dec, inc] = box.querySelectorAll('button');
			if (!input || !dec || !inc) return;
			dec.addEventListener('click', () => input.stepDown());
			inc.addEventListener('click', () => input.stepUp());
			});
		</script>
	</body>

		<div class="fixed bottom-0 inset-x-0 z-50 bg-white border-t border-gray-200 shadow-[0_-4px_6px_-1px_rgba(0,0,0,0.05)]">

                <button class="px-5 py-2.5 rounded-lg border border-gray-300 bg-white text-sm font-bold text-gray-600 hover:bg-gray-50 hover:text-gray-800 transition-colors mr-auto md:mr-0">
					ã‚­ãƒ£ãƒ³ã‚»ãƒ«
				</button>

                <div class="flex items-center gap-3">
                    <button class="flex items-center gap-2 px-5 py-2.5 rounded-lg border border-red-200 bg-red-50 text-sm font-bold text-red-600 hover:bg-red-100 hover:border-red-300 transition-colors">
                        <span class="material-symbols-outlined text-[18px]">assignment_return</span>

                    </button>
                    
                    <button class="flex items-center gap-2 px-6 py-2.5 rounded-lg bg-blue-600 text-white text-sm font-bold hover:bg-blue-700 shadow-sm hover:shadow active:scale-[0.98] transition-all">

		<template id="row-tpl">
			<div class="group relative flex flex-col sm:flex-row sm:items-center gap-4 rounded-xl bg-white border border-gray-200 shadow-sm px-5 py-4 hover:shadow-md hover:border-blue-200 transition-all duration-200">
			<div class="absolute left-0 top-3 bottom-3 w-1 bg-blue-500 rounded-r opacity-0 group-hover:opacity-100 transition-opacity"></div>

			<div class="flex items-center gap-4 flex-1 min-w-0">
				<div class="shrink-0">
				<span class="avatar inline-grid place-items-center size-10 rounded-full bg-blue-50 text-blue-600 font-bold text-sm border border-blue-100 shadow-sm">U</span>
				</div>
				<div class="min-w-0 flex-1">
				<div class="flex flex-wrap items-center gap-2">
					<p class="name text-sm font-bold text-gray-800 truncate group-hover:text-blue-700 transition-colors">ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼å</p>
					<span class="instruction-badge hidden text-[10px] px-2 py-0.5 rounded bg-indigo-50 text-indigo-700 border border-indigo-100 font-medium truncate max-w-[120px]">
						ãƒ‘ã‚¿ãƒ¼ãƒ³å
					</span>
				</div>
				
				<div class="mt-1 flex flex-wrap items-center gap-x-4 gap-y-1 text-xs text-gray-500 font-mono">
					<div class="flex items-center gap-1 bg-gray-50 px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded border border-gray-100">
						<span class="material-symbols-outlined text-[14px] text-gray-400">badge</span>
						<span class="id">user_id</span>
					</div>
					<div class="flex items-center gap-1">
						<span class="material-symbols-outlined text-[14px] text-gray-400">key</span>
						<span class="pwd-display">â€¢â€¢â€¢â€¢â€¢â€¢</span>
						<button class="toggle-row-pwd text-gray-400 hover:text-blue-600 transition-colors ml-1" title="ãƒ‘ã‚¹ãƒ¯ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’è¡¨ç¤º">
							<span class="material-symbols-outlined icon-sm">visibility</span>
						</button>
					</div>
				</div>
				</div>
			</div>

			<div class="flex items-center justify-end gap-2 mt-2 sm:mt-0 w-full sm:w-auto border-t sm:border-t-0 border-gray-100 pt-2 sm:pt-0">
				<button class="remove flex items-center justify-center size-8 rounded-full text-gray-400 hover:text-red-600 hover:bg-red-50 transition-colors" title="å‰Šé™¤">
				<span class="material-symbols-outlined icon-md">delete</span>
				</button>
			</div>
			</div>
		</template>

		<script>
			// --- UI Logic (Mock) ---
			
			// 1. Password Visibility Toggle (Main Form)
			const pwdInput = document.getElementById('pwd');
			const toggleBtn = document.getElementById('toggle-pwd');
			toggleBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
			const isPassword = pwdInput.type === 'password';
			pwdInput.type = isPassword ? 'text' : 'password';
			toggleBtn.querySelector('span').textContent = isPassword ? 'visibility_off' : 'visibility';
			});

			// 2. ID Auto Generation (Mock)
			const idInput = document.getElementById('uid');
			const genBtn = document.getElementById('gen-id');
			genBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
			const random = Math.random().toString(36).substring(2, 8);
			idInput.value = `user_${random}`;
			});

			// 3. Add User & List Rendering
			const addBtn = document.getElementById('add');
			const nameInput = document.getElementById('name');
			const instructionSelect = document.getElementById('instruction-select');
			const listContainer = document.getElementById('list');
			const emptyState = document.getElementById('empty');
			const countBadge = document.getElementById('count-badge');
			const template = document.getElementById('row-tpl');

			const updateListState = () => {
			const hasItems = listContainer.children.length > 0;
			emptyState.classList.toggle('hidden', hasItems);
			countBadge.textContent = listContainer.children.length;
			countBadge.classList.toggle('hidden', !hasItems);
			};

			addBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
			const name = nameInput.value.trim();
			const id = idInput.value.trim();
			const pwd = pwdInput.value.trim();
			const patternVal = instructionSelect.value;
			const patternText = instructionSelect.options[instructionSelect.selectedIndex].text;

			if (!name || !id || !pwd) {
				alert('åå‰ã€IDã€ãƒ‘ã‚¹ãƒ¯ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã¯å¿…é ˆã§ã™');
				return;
			}

			// Clone Template
			const clone = template.content.cloneNode(true);
			const row = clone.querySelector('div');
			
			// Set Data
			row.querySelector('.name').textContent = name;
			row.querySelector('.avatar').textContent = name.charAt(0);
			row.querySelector('.id').textContent = id;
			
			// Pattern Badge
			const badge = row.querySelector('.instruction-badge');
			if (patternVal) {
				badge.textContent = patternText;
				badge.classList.remove('hidden');
			}

			// Row Password Toggle
			const rowPwdDisplay = row.querySelector('.pwd-display');
			const rowToggleBtn = row.querySelector('.toggle-row-pwd');
			let isRowPwdVisible = false;
			rowToggleBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
				isRowPwdVisible = !isRowPwdVisible;
				rowPwdDisplay.textContent = isRowPwdVisible ? pwd : 'â€¢â€¢â€¢â€¢â€¢â€¢';
				rowToggleBtn.querySelector('span').textContent = isRowPwdVisible ? 'visibility_off' : 'visibility';
				rowToggleBtn.classList.toggle('text-blue-600', isRowPwdVisible);
			});

			// Remove Action
			row.querySelector('.remove').addEventListener('click', () => {
				if(confirm('å‰Šé™¤ã—ã¾ã™ã‹ï¼Ÿ')) {
					row.remove();
					updateListState();
				}
			});

			listContainer.appendChild(row);
			
			// Reset Form
			nameInput.value = '';
			idInput.value = '';
			pwdInput.value = '';
			instructionSelect.value = '';
			updateListState();
			});

			// Initial State
			updateListState();
			emptyState.classList.remove('hidden'); // Initially show empty

		</script>
	</body>
</html>

			const initialData = [
				{ id: 'FT-001', title: 'æœ€è¿‘ã®ã ã‚‰ã—ãªã„ãƒãƒã‚¸ãƒ£ãƒ¼ã®åŸå› ã¯ï¼Ÿ', thumb: 'https://placehold.jp/30/e0e7ff/3b82f6/320x180.png?text=Topic%20A' },
				{ id: 'FT-002', title: 'æ–°å…¥ç¤¾å“¡ã®ãƒ¡ãƒ³ã‚¿ãƒ«ãƒ˜ãƒ«ã‚¹å¯¾ç­–', thumb: 'https://placehold.jp/30/dcfce7/22c55e/320x180.png?text=Topic%20B' },
				{ id: 'FT-003', title: 'DXäººæè‚²æˆã®ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãƒãƒƒãƒ—', thumb: 'https://placehold.jp/30/fef3c7/f59e0b/320x180.png?text=Topic%20C' },
			];

			const list = document.getElementById('feature-list');
			const empty = document.getElementById('empty');
			const badge = document.getElementById('count-badge');
			const tpl = document.getElementById('card-tpl');

			// Render Item
			const renderItem = (data) => {
				const clone = tpl.content.cloneNode(true);
				const card = clone.querySelector('.feature-card');
				
				card.querySelector('.title').textContent = data.title;
				card.querySelector('.id-badge').textContent = data.id;
				
				const img = card.querySelector('.thumb-img');
				if(data.thumb) {
					img.src = data.thumb;
				} else {
					img.classList.add('hidden');
					card.querySelector('.thumb-placeholder').classList.remove('hidden');
				}

				// Move Logic
				card.querySelectorAll('button[data-move]').forEach(btn => {
					btn.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
						const move = btn.getAttribute('data-move');
						const current = e.target.closest('.feature-card');
						if (move === 'up' && current.previousElementSibling) {
							list.insertBefore(current, current.previousElementSibling);
						}
						if (move === 'down' && current.nextElementSibling) {
							list.insertBefore(current.nextElementSibling, current);
						}
					});
				});

				// Delete Logic
				card.querySelector('.remove').addEventListener('click', () => {
					if(confirm('å‰Šé™¤ã—ã¾ã™ã‹ï¼Ÿ')){
						card.remove();
						updateState();
					}
				});

				return card;
			};

			// Update UI State
			const updateState = () => {
				const count = list.children.length;
				if(count === 0) {
					empty.classList.remove('hidden');
					badge.classList.add('hidden');
				} else {
					empty.classList.add('hidden');
					badge.classList.remove('hidden');
					badge.textContent = count;
				}
			};

			// Add Button Logic
			const select = document.getElementById('topic-select');
			document.getElementById('add-btn').addEventListener('click', () => {
				const val = select.value;
				if(!val) return;
				
				const option = select.options[select.selectedIndex];
				const newItem = {
					id: 'FT-' + Math.floor(Math.random() * 1000), // mock ID
					title: option.dataset.title,
					thumb: option.dataset.thumb
				};
				
				list.appendChild(renderItem(newItem));
				select.value = "";
				updateState();
			});

			// Initial Render
			initialData.forEach(d => list.appendChild(renderItem(d)));
			updateState();

		</script>
	</body>
</html>


==================================================
FILE PATH: tag-master.html
==================================================

                        <label class="text-sm font-bold text-gray-700">ã‚¹ãƒ†ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚¹</label>

                    <button id="btnSubmit" class="px-4 py-2 rounded-md bg-blue-600 text-white font-bold hover:bg-blue-700 shadow-sm hover:shadow transition-all">ç™»éŒ²ã™ã‚‹</button>
                </div>

<script type="module">
    import { tagData } from './js/data/tag-data.js';

    window.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
        // --- MockUIåˆæœŸåŒ– ---
        if (typeof MockUI !== 'undefined') {
            MockUI.injectHeader('#app-header', {
                userName: 'Test User',
                brand: 'New SD App',
                initialRole: 'iec',
            });
            MockUI.injectSidebar('#app-sidebar');
        }

        // --- çŠ¶æ…‹ç®¡ç†å¤‰æ•° ---
        let currentTags = [...tagData];
        let currentPage = 1;
        const itemsPerPage = 10;

        // --- è¦ç´ ã®å–å¾— ---
        const modal = document.getElementById('modal');
        const btnOpenModal = document.getElementById('btnOpenModal');
        const btnCloseModal = document.getElementById('btnCloseModal');
        const btnCloseModalHeader = document.getElementById('btnCloseModalHeader');
        const btnSubmit = document.getElementById('btnSubmit');
        const modalTitle = document.getElementById('modalTitle');
        const tableBody = document.getElementById('tagTableBody');

        // æ¤œç´¢ãƒ»ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ãƒãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ç”¨è¦ç´ 
        const searchInput = document.getElementById('searchInput');
        const filterType = document.getElementById('filterType'); // â–¼ è¿½åŠ 
        const totalCountEl = document.getElementById('totalCount');
        const startCountEl = document.getElementById('startCount');
        const endCountEl = document.getElementById('endCount');
        const btnPrev = document.getElementById('btnPrev');
        const btnNext = document.getElementById('btnNext');
        const pageIndicator = document.getElementById('pageIndicator');

        // å…¥åŠ›ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ è¦ç´ 
        const inputTagId = document.getElementById('inputTagId');
        const inputType = document.getElementById('inputType');
        const inputName = document.getElementById('inputName');
        const radioStatuses = document.getElementsByName('status');

        // --- ãƒãƒƒã‚¸ç”Ÿæˆé–¢æ•° ---
        const getTypeBadge = (type) => {
            const styles = {
                'target': { bg: 'bg-sky-100', text: 'text-sky-800', label: 'å¯¾è±¡ãƒ»éšå±¤' },
                'genre':  { bg: 'bg-slate-100', text: 'text-slate-800', label: 'ã‚¸ãƒ£ãƒ³ãƒ«' },
                'level':  { bg: 'bg-orange-100', text: 'text-orange-800', label: 'é›£æ˜“åº¦' },
                'other':  { bg: 'bg-rose-100', text: 'text-rose-800', label: 'ãã®ä»–' }
            };
            const style = styles[type] || styles['other'];
            return `<span class="inline-flex items-center px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium ${style.bg} ${style.text}">${style.label}</span>`;
        };

        const getStatusBadge = (status) => {
            if (status === 'public') {
                return `<span class="inline-flex items-center gap-1 px-2.5 py-1 rounded-full text-xs font-medium bg-green-50 text-green-700 border border-green-100"><span class="w-1.5 h-1.5 bg-green-500 rounded-full"></span>å…¬é–‹</span>`;
            } else {
                return `<span class="inline-flex items-center gap-1 px-2.5 py-1 rounded-full text-xs font-medium bg-gray-100 text-gray-600 border border-gray-200"><span class="w-1.5 h-1.5 bg-gray-400 rounded-full"></span>éå…¬é–‹</span>`;
            }
        };

        // --- ãƒ­ã‚¸ãƒƒã‚¯é–¢æ•° ---

        const updatePaginationUI = () => {
            const total = currentTags.length;
            const start = total === 0 ? 0 : (currentPage - 1) * itemsPerPage + 1;
            const end = Math.min(currentPage * itemsPerPage, total);
            const totalPages = Math.ceil(total / itemsPerPage);

            totalCountEl.textContent = total;
            startCountEl.textContent = start;
            endCountEl.textContent = end;
            pageIndicator.textContent = total === 0 ? 0 : currentPage;

            btnPrev.disabled = currentPage === 1 || total === 0;
            btnNext.disabled = currentPage === totalPages || total === 0;
        };

        const renderTags = () => {
            if (!tableBody) return;

            const startIndex = (currentPage - 1) * itemsPerPage;
            const endIndex = startIndex + itemsPerPage;
            const slicedData = currentTags.slice(startIndex, endIndex);

            if (slicedData.length === 0) {
                tableBody.innerHTML = `<tr><td colspan="5" class="px-6 py-10 text-center text-gray-500">ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãŒè¦‹ã¤ã‹ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“ã§ã—ãŸ</td></tr>`;
                updatePaginationUI();
                return;
            }

            const html = slicedData.map(tag => {
                return `
                <tr class="hover:bg-gray-50 transition-colors cursor-pointer js-row group relative" 
                    data-id="${tag.id}" 
                    data-type="${tag.type}" 
                    data-name="${tag.name}" 
                    data-corp="${tag.corpId}" 
                    data-status="${tag.status}">
                    <td class="px-6 py-4">${getTypeBadge(tag.type)}</td>
                    <td class="px-6 py-4 text-sm text-gray-900 font-medium">${tag.name}</td>
                    <td class="px-6 py-4 text-sm text-gray-600">
                        <div class="flex flex-col">
                            <span class="font-medium text-gray-800">${tag.corpName}</span>
                            <span class="text-xs text-gray-400">ID: ${tag.corpId}</span>
                        </div>
                    </td>
                    <td class="px-6 py-4 text-center">${getStatusBadge(tag.status)}</td>
                    <td class="px-6 py-4 text-center">
                        <div class="inline-block text-left">
                            <button type="button" class="flex menu-trigger p-2 rounded-full text-gray-400 hover:text-gray-600 hover:bg-gray-100 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 transition-colors z-10 relative">
                                <span class="material-symbols-outlined icon-md">more_horiz</span>
                            </button>
                            <div class="menu hidden absolute right-8 mt-[-10px] w-48 origin-top-right rounded-md bg-white shadow-lg ring-1 ring-black ring-opacity-5 focus:outline-none z-20">
                                <div class="py-1">
                                    <a href="#" class="group flex items-center px-4 py-2 text-sm text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-50 hover:text-gray-900 js-edit-action">
                                        <span class="material-symbols-outlined icon-sm mr-3 text-gray-400 group-hover:text-gray-500">edit</span>
                                        ç·¨é›†ã™ã‚‹
                                    </a>
                                    <a href="#" class="group flex items-center px-4 py-2 text-sm text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-50 hover:text-gray-900">
                                        <span class="material-symbols-outlined icon-sm mr-3 text-gray-400 group-hover:text-gray-500">lock</span>
                                        ${tag.status === 'public' ? 'éå…¬é–‹ã«ã™ã‚‹' : 'å…¬é–‹ã™ã‚‹'}
                                    </a>
                                </div>
                                <div class="border-t border-gray-100 my-1"></div>
                                <div class="py-1">
                                    <a href="#" class="group flex items-center px-4 py-2 text-sm text-red-600 hover:bg-red-50">
                                        <span class="material-symbols-outlined icon-sm mr-3 text-red-400 group-hover:text-red-500">delete</span>
                                        å‰Šé™¤ã™ã‚‹
                                    </a>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </td>
                </tr>
                `;
            }).join('');

            tableBody.innerHTML = html;
            updatePaginationUI();
        };
        
        // â–¼ å¤‰æ›´: å¼•æ•°ãªã—ã§ã€ç¾åœ¨ã®å…¥åŠ›çŠ¶æ…‹ã‚’è¦‹ã¦ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ«ã‚¿ãƒªãƒ³ã‚°
        const filterData = () => {
            const keyword = searchInput.value.trim().toLowerCase();
            const type = filterType.value; // ã‚»ãƒ¬ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒœãƒƒã‚¯ã‚¹ã®å€¤

            currentTags = tagData.filter(tag => {
                // ã‚­ãƒ¼ãƒ¯ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ä¸€è‡´åˆ¤å®š (åå‰ or ä¼æ¥­å)
                const matchKeyword = !keyword || 
                    tag.name.toLowerCase().includes(keyword) || 
                    tag.corpName.toLowerCase().includes(keyword);

                // ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ—ä¸€è‡´åˆ¤å®š (é¸æŠãªã— or ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ—ä¸€è‡´)
                const matchType = !type || tag.type === type;

                // ANDæ¡ä»¶ã§è¿”å´
                return matchKeyword && matchType;
            });

            currentPage = 1; // æ¤œç´¢æ¡ä»¶ãŒå¤‰ã‚ã£ãŸã‚‰1ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ç›®ã«æˆ»ã™
            renderTags();
        };

        // --- ã‚¤ãƒ™ãƒ³ãƒˆãƒªã‚¹ãƒŠãƒ¼ ---
        
        // æ¤œç´¢ãƒœãƒƒã‚¯ã‚¹ (å…¥åŠ›æ™‚)
        searchInput.addEventListener('input', filterData);
        
        // â–¼ è¿½åŠ : ã‚¿ã‚°ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ—é¸æŠ (å¤‰æ›´æ™‚)
        filterType.addEventListener('change', filterData);

        // ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ãƒãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³
        btnPrev.addEventListener('click', () => {
            if (currentPage > 1) {
                currentPage--;
                renderTags();
            }
        });

        btnNext.addEventListener('click', () => {
            const totalPages = Math.ceil(currentTags.length / itemsPerPage);
            if (currentPage < totalPages) {
                currentPage++;
                renderTags();
            }
        });

        // ãƒ†ãƒ¼ãƒ–ãƒ«å†…ã‚¤ãƒ™ãƒ³ãƒˆ
        tableBody.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
            const target = e.target;
            const menuTrigger = target.closest('.menu-trigger');
            if (menuTrigger) {
                e.stopPropagation();
                const menu = menuTrigger.nextElementSibling;
                closeAllMenus();
                if (menu) menu.classList.remove('hidden');
                return;
            }
            const editAction = target.closest('.js-edit-action');
            if (editAction) {
                e.preventDefault();
                e.stopPropagation();
                const row = target.closest('tr');
                if (row) openModal('edit', row.dataset);
                return;
            }
            const row = target.closest('tr');
            if (row && !target.closest('.menu')) {
                openModal('edit', row.dataset);
            }
        });

        // ãƒ¢ãƒ¼ãƒ€ãƒ«é–¢é€£
        const closeAllMenus = () => {
            document.querySelectorAll(".menu").forEach(m => m.classList.add("hidden"));
        };
        const openModal = (mode, data = null) => {
            closeAllMenus();
            if (mode === 'edit') {
                modalTitle.querySelector('.text').textContent = 'ã‚¿ã‚°æƒ…å ±ã®ç·¨é›†';
                modalTitle.querySelector('.material-symbols-outlined').textContent = 'edit_note';
                btnSubmit.textContent = 'æ›´æ–°ã™ã‚‹';
                if (data) {
                    inputTagId.value = data.id || '';
                    inputType.value = data.type || '';
                    inputName.value = data.name || '';
                    Array.from(radioStatuses).forEach(radio => radio.checked = (radio.value === data.status));
                }
            } else {
                modalTitle.querySelector('.text').textContent = 'ã‚ªãƒªã‚¸ãƒŠãƒ«ã‚¿ã‚°ç™»éŒ²';
                modalTitle.querySelector('.material-symbols-outlined').textContent = 'bookmark_add';
                btnSubmit.textContent = 'ç™»éŒ²ã™ã‚‹';
                inputTagId.value = '';
                inputType.value = '';
                inputName.value = '';
                if(radioStatuses[0]) radioStatuses[0].checked = true;
            }
            modal.classList.remove('hidden');
        };
        const closeModal = () => modal.classList.add('hidden');

        btnOpenModal.addEventListener('click', () => openModal('new'));
        btnCloseModal.addEventListener('click', closeModal);
        btnCloseModalHeader.addEventListener('click', closeModal);
        modal.addEventListener('click', (e) => { if (e.target === modal) closeModal(); });
        document.addEventListener("click", () => closeAllMenus());
        document.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
            if (e.target.closest('.menu')) e.stopPropagation();
        }, true);
        
        // åˆæœŸè¡¨ç¤º
        renderTags();
    });
</script>
    </body>
</html>


==================================================

                                <thead class="bg-gray-50 border-b border-gray-200">

                                        <th class="px-6 py-3 text-xs font-semibold text-gray-500 uppercase tracking-wider text-center">ã‚¹ãƒ†ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚¹</th>

                                    </tr>
                                </thead>
                                <tbody class="divide-y divide-gray-100 bg-white">
                                    <tr class="hover:bg-gray-50 transition-colors group">
                                        <td class="px-6 py-4">
                                            <div class="h-14 w-24 rounded-md bg-gray-100 border border-gray-200 overflow-hidden">
                                                <img src="./img/slide1.webp" alt="" class="h-full w-full object-cover" onerror="this.style.display='none';this.parentElement.classList.add('flex','items-center','justify-center');this.parentElement.innerHTML='<span class=\'material-symbols-outlined text-gray-300\'>image</span>'">
                                            </div>
                                        </td>
                                        <td class="px-6 py-4 text-sm text-gray-900 font-medium">
                                            æ˜¥ã®æ–°äººç ”ä¿®ç‰¹é›†2025
                                        </td>
                                        <td class="px-6 py-4 text-sm text-gray-500">
                                            ãªã—
                                        </td>
                                        <td class="px-6 py-4 text-center">
                                            <span class="inline-flex items-center gap-1 px-2.5 py-1 rounded-full text-xs font-medium bg-green-50 text-green-700 border border-green-100">
                                                <span class="w-1.5 h-1.5 bg-green-500 rounded-full"></span>
                                                å…¬é–‹
                                            </span>
                                        </td>
                                        <td class="px-6 py-4 text-center relative">
                                            <div class="relative inline-block text-left">
                                                <button data-row="1" class="flex menu-trigger p-2 rounded-full text-gray-400 hover:text-gray-600 hover:bg-gray-100 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 focus:ring-offset-2 transition-colors group-hover:bg-gray-100">
                                                    <span class="material-symbols-outlined icon-md">more_horiz</span>
                                                </button>
                                                <div id="row-1-items" class="menu hidden absolute right-0 mt-2 w-48 origin-top-right rounded-md bg-white shadow-lg ring-1 ring-black ring-opacity-5 focus:outline-none z-10">
                                                    <div class="py-1">
                                                        <a href="topics-master-detail.html" class="group flex items-center px-4 py-2 text-sm text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-50 hover:text-gray-900">
                                                            <span class="material-symbols-outlined icon-sm mr-3 text-gray-400 group-hover:text-gray-500">edit</span>
                                                            ç·¨é›†ã™ã‚‹

        <script>
            window.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
                // --- MockUIåˆæœŸåŒ– ---
                if (typeof MockUI !== 'undefined') {
                    MockUI.injectHeader('#app-header', {
                        userName: 'Test User',
                        brand: 'New SD App',
                        initialRole: 'iec',
                    });
                    MockUI.injectSidebar('#app-sidebar');
                }

                // --- 3ç‚¹ãƒªãƒ¼ãƒ€ãƒ¼ãƒ¡ãƒ‹ãƒ¥ãƒ¼ã®åˆ¶å¾¡ ---
                const triggers = document.querySelectorAll(".menu-trigger");
                const menus = document.querySelectorAll(".menu");

                // ãƒ¡ãƒ‹ãƒ¥ãƒ¼ã‚’ã™ã¹ã¦é–‰ã˜ã‚‹é–¢æ•°
                const closeAllMenus = () => {
                    menus.forEach(menu => menu.classList.add("hidden"));
                };

                // ãƒˆãƒªã‚¬ãƒ¼ã®ã‚¯ãƒªãƒƒã‚¯ã‚¤ãƒ™ãƒ³ãƒˆ
                triggers.forEach(trigger => {
                    trigger.addEventListener("click", (e) => {
                        e.stopPropagation(); // è¡Œã‚¯ãƒªãƒƒã‚¯ã‚„è¦ªè¦ç´ ã¸ã®ä¼æ’­ã‚’æ­¢ã‚ã‚‹
                        
                        const rowId = trigger.dataset.row;
                        const targetMenu = document.getElementById(`row-${rowId}-items`);

                        // ä¸€æ—¦ã™ã¹ã¦é–‰ã˜ã¦ã‹ã‚‰
                        const isCurrentlyHidden = targetMenu.classList.contains("hidden");
                        closeAllMenus();

                        // ã‚¿ãƒ¼ã‚²ãƒƒãƒˆã®çŠ¶æ…‹ã‚’åè»¢ï¼ˆé–‹ã„ã¦ãŸã‚‰é–‰ã˜ãŸã¾ã¾ã€é–‰ã˜ã¦ãŸã‚‰é–‹ãï¼‰
                        if (isCurrentlyHidden) {
                            targetMenu.classList.remove("hidden");
                        }
                    });
                });

                // ãƒ¡ãƒ‹ãƒ¥ãƒ¼å†…éƒ¨ã‚¯ãƒªãƒƒã‚¯ã§é–‰ã˜ãªã„ã‚ˆã†ã«ã™ã‚‹
                menus.forEach(menu => {
                    menu.addEventListener("click", (e) => e.stopPropagation());
                });

                // ç”»é¢ã®ã©ã“ã‹ã‚’ã‚¯ãƒªãƒƒã‚¯ã—ãŸã‚‰ãƒ¡ãƒ‹ãƒ¥ãƒ¼ã‚’é–‰ã˜ã‚‹
                document.addEventListener("click", () => {
                    closeAllMenus();
                });
            });
        </script>
    </body>
</html>

                        <label class="text-sm font-bold text-gray-700">ã‚¢ã‚¯ã‚»ã‚¹å…ƒIPæŒ‡å®š</label>

                    <button class="px-4 py-2 rounded-md bg-blue-600 text-white font-bold hover:bg-blue-700 shadow-sm hover:shadow transition-all">ç™»éŒ²ã™ã‚‹</button>

    </body>
</html>
<script>
  window.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
    // åˆæœŸãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã‚„ãƒ–ãƒ©ãƒ³ãƒ‰åãƒ»ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼åã¯è‡ªç”±ã«
    MockUI.injectHeader('#app-header', {
      userName: 'Test User',
      brand: 'New SD App',
      initialRole: 'iec', // åˆå›roleãŒæœªæŒ‡å®šãªã‚‰iecã‚’ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆ
    });
    MockUI.injectSidebar('#app-sidebar');

    // ã‚µã‚¤ãƒ‰ãƒãƒ¼æŒ¿å…¥ç›´å¾Œã« data-visible-for ã‚’åæ˜ 
    RoleMock.applyRoleVisibility();

    // ãƒ¡ãƒ‹ãƒ¥ãƒ¼ã‚’ã™ã¹ã¦é–‰ã˜ã‚‹
    const closeAllMenus = () => {
        document.querySelectorAll(".menu").forEach(m => m.classList.add("hidden"));
    };

    const modal = document.getElementById('modal');
    const btnOpenModal = document.getElementById('btnOpenModal');
    const btnCloseModal = document.getElementById('btnCloseModal');
    const btnCloseModalHeader = document.getElementById('btnCloseModalHeader');

    // ãƒ¢ãƒ¼ãƒ€ãƒ«æ“ä½œ
    const openModal = () => {
        closeAllMenus();
        modal.classList.remove('hidden');
    };
    const closeModal = () => {
        modal.classList.add('hidden');
    };

    btnOpenModal.addEventListener('click', openModal);
    btnCloseModal.addEventListener('click', closeModal);
    btnCloseModalHeader.addEventListener('click', closeModal);
    
    // èƒŒæ™¯ã‚¯ãƒªãƒƒã‚¯ã§é–‰ã˜ã‚‹
    modal.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
        if(e.target === modal) closeModal();
    });

    // ã™ã¹ã¦ã®ãƒˆãƒªã‚¬ãƒ¼ã‚’å–å¾—
    const triggers = document.querySelectorAll(".menu-trigger");
    const menus = document.querySelectorAll(".menu");

    triggers.forEach(trigger => {
        trigger.addEventListener("click", (e) => {
        e.stopPropagation(); // å¤–éƒ¨ã‚¯ãƒªãƒƒã‚¯å‡¦ç†ã‚’æ­¢ã‚ã‚‹

        // ä»–ã®ãƒ¡ãƒ‹ãƒ¥ãƒ¼ã‚’é–‰ã˜ã‚‹
        menus.forEach(menu => menu.classList.add("hidden"));

        // å¯¾å¿œã™ã‚‹ãƒ¡ãƒ‹ãƒ¥ãƒ¼ã‚’é–‹é–‰
        const rowId = trigger.dataset.row;
        const menu = document.getElementById(`row-${rowId}-items`);
        menu.classList.toggle("hidden");
        });
    });

    // ãƒ¡ãƒ‹ãƒ¥ãƒ¼å†…ã‚¯ãƒªãƒƒã‚¯ã§ã¯é–‰ã˜ãªã„
    menus.forEach(menu => {
        menu.addEventListener("click", (e) => e.stopPropagation());
    });

    // é ˜åŸŸå¤–ã‚¯ãƒªãƒƒã‚¯ã§å…¨éƒ¨é–‰ã˜ã‚‹
    document.addEventListener("click", () => {
        closeAllMenus();
    });
  });
</script>
